1.title: Transformation cop

11.content:
The TFPD Witness Protection Program uses the latest in technology to conceal and protect witnesses thought to be at danger of retribution prior to testifying in court. It is responsible for concocting new identities, surgically and chemically altering witnesses to fit, then rehoming them. After giving testimony, witnesses may be returned to normal or, in cases where there remains an ongoing threat to their lives, they may be given permanent new identities, spending the rest of their lives under the watchful gaze of the program.

The bulk of witnesses are ex-cons turned informant but may be any citizen unlucky enough to be in the wrong place at the wrong time..

False identities are meticulously crafted, randomly distributed, and it is known that Doctor Yamato has begun to venture beyond mere human disguises. There are tales of entire sections of the National zoo populated by ex-Mafiosos, and rumours of even more alien, disturbing disguises, spoken of only as hushed whispers in cop bars.

Officer Charles Olson - Those who were around when Officer Olson first joined Witness Protection twenty years ago remember him as a squat balding man in his late 50s. He has since matured into a swarthy, statuesque 35-year-old stud, a transition that may have something to do with his close relationship with plastic surgeon Doctor Yamato and the unsolved disappearance of several items from the evidence locker relating to the investigation into the Doctor's past misdeeds.

Beneath his handsome exterior, Olson remains a dirty old man, rotten to the core. He is a slippery character, somehow dodging two investigations into police corruption, as well as retirement.

Officer Jennifer Summers - A well-meaning agent who cares deeply about her work. She has personally rehomed a number of witnesses in her own home, despite her allergies to cat and dog hair.

11113.content:
Mary Ford looked at her reflection in her vanity’s mirror as she clasped a sting of pearls around her neck. In the months since she and her family had gone into witness protection and being drastically transformed she’d learned quite a bit about makeup and how to dress her new body.

The TFPD had done a terrifyingly good job of transforming her from Max Miller, a teenage boy, into Mary Ford, a 37 year old single mother of two teenage girls. At first it had been incredibly jarring to see an adult woman staring back at her in the mirror. There was nothing in her reflection that tied her back to the boy she had been.

When they arrived at their new home, in their new town, it became apparent that the TFPD wasn’t going to take any chances. Nothing in the house connected them to their old house. The clothes Mary had found in her closet were decidedly feminine. Gone were her rock band t-shirts, comfortable jeans, loose clothes or anything that wasn’t designed to show off her MILF figure.

The girls, her former mom and dad, had very much the same experience. There was nothing in the house that spoke of who they used to be. Anna, her former mom, had taken things in stride. She was happy to be young again and still the same gender. She and her husband-turned-sister had been young parents and she had regretted losing out on certain things in order to start a family so early. She saw this as a second chance.

In the beginning Anna had helped Mary figure out makeup, how to dress, how to handle her time of the month. They had bonded quite a bit. As far as the world would know, it was now Mary who had been the young mother, having apparently had Anne at 18. The story the TFPD had crafted was that Mary had become pregnant in high school, she had apparently been quite the heartbreaker in her day, and she dropped out soon after. Three years later she became pregnant with Dakota. The supposed father in their cover story had apparently left Mary to raise her daughters on her own. At some point in this made up life Mary had gotten her GED and had worked a series of jobs over the years.

All of this was a fantasy, but it was the fantasy they were supposed to tell if they were asked. The TFPD had gotten Mary a job with a local company as an executive assistant, all built on a fake work history for a person who hadn’t existed a few months before. What was strange was how the cover story had slowly become more and more real to her. Heck, the TFPD had given her stretch marks to make it quite apparent that she’d supposedly given birth before. It was easier to believe the lie than to believe the truth of who she used to be.

Dakota had had the roughest time in accepting who she had become. She had become the quintessential blonde beauty you see on TV, at least physically. The three of them had been given curvy bodies that were undeniably female. For Dakota the change had been radical. To go from a towering, masculine father, to a 16 year old girl with looks that were straight out of a teenage boy’s dreams … well, it had been too much for her mind to take. She had a nervous breakdown only a few days after they arrived at their new house. Mary had called their handlers in the TFPD and they had sent some specialists to help, but in the end they said that sort of thing sometimes happened with people who entered the program. All they could do was monitor Dakota and let her sort things out for herself.

By the time she started to come back she had embraced a new persona that was completely separate from who she had been. She wouldn’t even acknowledge that they had been different people anymore. Her personality became just what she appeared to be, a typical blonde, air-head. Mary and Anna had tried to help her remember in the beginning, but ultimately decided it was perhaps better if Dakota just embraced her new life and forgot the horrors she had seen leading up to their transformations.

Mary smoothed out her outfit as she got up, stepping confidently on her high-heels as though she’d been walking in them for years. Sometimes she missed who she had been, and she always marveled at the immense changes they had all undergone, but she had to get the day started and a mother couldn’t waste too much time lost in thought.

1112.content:
"We'll keep you together..." The taller agent explained to Victoria.

"But, we need to keep you below the radar." The agent stuffing a doughnut into his mouth added.

"So?" Paul asked with a certain resigned tone. He'd already had a close escape, after overhearing the plans. Wishing he'd not been in that damned restaurant, not come forward, that... hell, he wasn't some deep undercover asset. This whole situation was overwhelming, he'd just wanted a quiet meal, in a fancy Italian Bistro. Now he and his whole family were living a nightmare from day to day.

The look the agents exchanged made Paul's stomach flip. He knew before either opened their mouth it was going to be bad.

"Think of it as a fresh start." The tall man suggested.

"If you prefer it, you can even keep it, after the trial." The other suggested.

Reaching into his pocket, he pulled out a crumpled pack of chewing gum. Offering it to the Millers' they each accepted automatically, glad for something to do, even if it was simply chewing.

"So..." Victoria repeated Paul's question with a little more force.

Max nodded his interest too, eager to find out about their new lives.

"Well, you'll stay together and study together."

"Study?" Paul asked. His voice cracking as he interrupted.

"You'll be hidden as students. Studying at the university."

"Sorority Sisters." The other added to clarify.

"Oh, and actual sisters too."

"Sisters...." Max squeaked.

"Triplets, even."

The agents passed the two stunned men a package, and another for Victoria.

"Well, It's Maxine, and Pauline... closest to your former name keeps things simpler." The tall man added.

"I ... I won't..." Paul squeaked in protest.

"Yeah... ", Max agreed, "Something else... not a girl..."

"Well, more a woman than a girl." The sugar sprinkles on his cheeks hinting at a secret smile.

"It's not really negotiable... Besides..."

He nodded to the empty chewing gum packet on the table.

"You've already taken the nanites, and they are programmed."

"Wha..." Max objected, as he felt the room slip sideways, and collapse to the floor. His wife and son, landing in quick succession as the nanites reworked their bodies over to fit their new lives.

1132.content:
Edward Thompson-

A low level trapper for the transformation mafia. His job was to find and lure young unsuspecting people to the secret transformation lab where the mafia would turn them into sexy women to be used as hookers, strippers, and to work in brothels.

After a sudden change of heart Edward turned himself TFPD and in exchange for all charges being dropped on him he agreed to testify in court against his former bosses. However he must be put into witness protection until the trial.

However the only option available to the TFPD is to turn Edward into the same kind of woman he used to trap others into becoming. Setting him up in a new town working as a waitress at a rather sleezy restaurant.

11321.content:
“Are you sure about this? Is there no other way?” Edward asked the two TFPD officers he was with in the interrogation room.

“I’m afraid not Mr. Thompson. You should know this by now. The radiation therapy we use is much safer than that black market garbage your mafia family stole. The only way for the transformation to last is for a gender reversal he added to it. Other wise the change would only last days at best. You might be in protective custody for months.” Officer Jennifer Summers said back to him.

“You call it safer....We call that cowardice. No wonder you can’t catch up to the family with a snitch like me.” Edward said sarcastically as he rolled his eyes.

“Listen here creep. You would be facing 25-30 years for trafficking if not for cooperation. If you don’t want to spend the next 6 months tossed away in some tiny cell you are just gonna have to get over it. Besides it might be good for you to live with a pair of tits for awhile. Give you a little insight into what you helped do to all those innocent people.” Officer Charles Olsen said slamming his hands on the table.

Edward wasn’t stupid. He saw through the good cop, bad cop, routine here. If he had things his way he never would turned away from the life like this. He was a trapper and a damn good one. Using his charm and good looks Edward or Eddie as he preferred to be called would lure people, usually tourists, immigrants, and people to dumb to know better to the secret lab of the transformation mafia. There the mafia would use their stolen tech to turn their victims into all sorts of things. Most common though was they were turned into sexy women to be used as hookers and strippers. They were treated like slaves told to obey if they ever wanted to be changed back.

Normally Eddie didn’t think to hard about what happened to the people he lured. He would take people to local bars and clubs owned by the mafia and party and get drunk with his victims until they didn’t know better. There he would signal the enforcers to come and take them while they couldn’t fight back or cause a scene.

It wasn’t how he wanted to make a living but when the mafia offered him a thousand dollars a head he couldn’t refuse. Three years later he became the best trapper in the city. Until....Until he made a choice. One that cost him his job, status in the mafia, and put a heavy price on his head. Now the TFPD was his only chance at staying alive.

“So you turn me into a chick for the next few months while you build your legal case? I hide out in another town working some crap job as a waitress while you protect me? Then when the time comes you change me back and I testify and then I’m free? Sound about right?” Eddie asked hating his new situation but what choice did he have?

“You got it Mr. Thompson. Officer Olsen and I will go undercover and be keeping tabs on you. Any attempts to run, expose your true identity, or reconnect with your mafia pals and the deal is terminated. We move forward with full trafficking charges on you. Got it?” Officer Summers said.

“Damn lucky you are. Way better deal than you deserve.” Officer Olsen said.

“Fine....Deal.” Eddie said as he signed the contract that was put in front of him.

“Alright let’s begin.” Officer Summers said.

113211.content:
Eddie was lead out of the interrogation room in handcuffs guided by Officers Summers and Olsen. It was clear to Eddie how each of them saw his situation. Olsen hated it and thought this was a waste of time of resources. Better to just lock up or even better force him to talk. Summers seemed to see this situation as an opportunity. A way to learn, observe and hopefully end a terrible human trafficking ring that has plagued this city.

Eddie just wanted freedom and safety, whatever the cost. He knew there was no going back at this point. He figured having tits for a couple months was a small price to pay in the long run.

“Oh no Mr. Thompson. We already have your profile set. I was just curious because well....I am a firm believer in Karma and well....You will understand.” Summers said with a smile as she closed the door to the white cell locking Eddie inside.

“What kind of profile did you....are you kidding me?” Olsen said as he glanced over at the design on the computer.

“I know it’s ironic. However his cover requires a body like this.” Summer explained.

“Whatever let’s just get this over with.” Olsen said shaking his head.

Eddie waited patiently walking around naked in the cell until he suddenly saw the white lights above him begin to change. They began flashing before turning a deep red color flooding the room with crimson light.

“Mr Thompson. Please try to relax. The transformation can be...well...uncomfortable.” Summers said through the intercom.

Well Sophie why are you working on the street at such a young age your only what 17 or 18, you make something up and she then says look honey you shouldn't be here.

But I can't go back home, she hugs you and says look I'll help you and you can stay with me at my place and no one will hurt you again.

What do you do?
121322222.title: That Night

choices: A prestigious girl's school in the UK is being targeted by terrorists
A law firm has uncovered information on the TFPDs secret operations
The President is in desperate need of the TFPD
122.content:
You lay back on the sofa, relaxing as you browsed through the latest issue of The New York Times. A once respected magazine, its now grayish pages contained what seemed to be gossip from all around the globe - with headlines such as, "Russian ships are a provocation of new war!", "The Chi-coms are taking over this economy.", and "Will Toranpu's secret love affair finally spark a debate?" It's all nonsense -- a result of the CIA abandoning the sinking vessel and cutting all of its lines of communication.

"Still reading that crap?"

You glance upwards as your roommate Igor strides into the room. Tall; short, sandy blonde hair; chiseled musculature; and what girl would describe as 'handsome', he was the target of men's envy and women's desire. Born in Boston to a pair of Russian and Ukrainian immigrants, he was recruited to the TFPD at a remarkably young age and trained by the brightest counterintelligence agents. Hailed as a genius, this was all owed to a special genome that was present in him since birth. Remarkably, it allowed him to essentially mutate his body: turning fat into muscles, control the flow of blood within his veins and arteries, and hair growth, among others.

You, on the other hand, were recruited at an old (for a counterintelligence officer!) age, at a ripe 19, and thus were considered to be an upstart, given your position. Your recruitment story is also quite unorthodox, considering you were just a normal civilian who studied in college, aiming to become a mechanical engineer. Yet that all turned about when Igor, having been chasing after a high profile target, committed a blunder by stabbing your lung after he rounded yet another corner in chase, surprised by your presence. Fortunately, the resources of the TFPD kept you alive, but the near-death experience also awoke something deep within you -- a genome that resonated with Igor's -- that held quite a few secrets.

Yet now, after being promoted to corporal within the ranks, you were one part of the famous duo that thwarted world-ending crises using wits and skill, deviously combating madmen to ensure that people get to see another tomorrow.

"Eh, it's not even that interesting," you reply, tossing aside the journal. A swift press of the button and out comes the champagne bottle. You gently twist the cork and pour yourself a drink.

"Already drinking this early in the morning?" Igor tuts, clearly displeased. "Seems you haven't been drilled enough. To think that an ace of the prestigious counterintelligence division is drinking his ass to a stupor! How shameful."

"Oh shut it, will ya? It's not as if you guys aren't putting me through the runner in each day. I haven't had a break in so long... give me some slack!"

He shrugs his shoulders. "Considering that you're on duty now, I don't see why I should."

You groan, "The old hag's got another mission for me?"

"The mission never ends, friend. The world is always in danger and we, the counterintelligence agents of the TFPD, are always here to save it."

"Well that sounds a hell of a lot of work for me," you sigh, slamming the champagne bottle back into its ice bucket. "What's the disaster this time?"
122.title: On an undercover mission

choices: As a parent of yours to get you all signed in.
As a new member of the staff.
As Your Sister joining he academy as well
1221.content:
And That's how you found yourself shrunk down to 5'3, with blond hair and bangs dressed in a silly little skirt and blouse,

You weren't able to smuggle a gun onto campus, but your two inch heeled shoes had a hidden dagger and your gold heart shaped earrings were secretly an earpiece.

You stood in front of St. Mary's, an expensive... prestigious academy for the entire UK, and prestigious... was an understatement, Every Member of the Wealthy elite with a daughter had her here, Daughters of Parliament, and even the Prime Minister.

https://i.pinimg.com/236x/2e/4d/7f/2e4d7...

You clicked your heel against the ground, annoyed, you'd spent the last couple of days practicing a british accent and going over recent slangs and trivia a teen girl should know.

You glanced over at Igor, he'd of course joined you on this mission, He of course had his own new look...
1221.title: A prestigious girl's school...

choices: Getting a dorm and meeting your Roommate.
12212.content:
Igor had always been taller than you, but his new Persona as Gym Teacher Olga Sokolov was 6'4" massively towering over your diminutive frame as a petite teenage girl.

Igor looked at you with a grin, hefting his massive bust upwards in his track suit.

He'd always liked taking new exciting forms, the more unique the better, you had a feeling he particularly liked becoming women but couldn't guarantee it, Conversely you weren't a fan of becoming someone weak and helpless, you'd been a woman before but with your strength and you were able to carry a gun, but not this time, smaller and physically weaker than you'd ever been, and nearly helpless.

Alright Ava, you know the Mission, fraternize, make friends, make sure if anyone has seen anything odd, that you hear about the gossip, I'll do the same with the staff, and if something happens we'll be there to stop it.

"Right right, I read the mission brief too, You know I only look like a child right? you don't need to treat me like one."

"But you look so cute when your flustered, Olga pinched your cheek with her large mannish hands.

You turned away and started heading through the gate towards the entrance, your heels clicking echoing behind you. A moment later, the Sound of Olga's large sneakers stomping on the pavement followed you.
12212.title: As a new member of the staff.

1223.content:
"It's the President," Igor responds. You perk up. While the TFPD may be considered one of the high-profile organizations in the US, just short of the three letter ones, you've never actually got to do any work regarding high-ranking officials, especially ones as important as the President.

"What is it? Is someone targeting his life? Who? The CIA? The Chinese? ISIS?"

"No, it's his son..."

"Oh gosh, was he kidnapped? Drugged? Murdered?"

"No, it's more like he's been depressed lately and..."

"Got it," you nod. "He's entertaining suicidal thoughts. And we, the TFPD, must find the root of all this and bring justice and happiness back to the poor lad."

"Well, not quite," Igor grimaces, a sign you know all too well. You aren't going to enjoy hearing this news. "It's more like he's lonely and horny. No girlfriend, no friends, just an all-out loser so to speak."

"No friends?" You raise an eyebrow at this. "I would imagine that, as a rich brat and his father in a high position, he'd at least have a couple of friends with benefits."

"I thought so too," Igor replies, shrugging his shoulders. "But it seems like he's very sensitive to people who suck up to him for money and power. It appears that he wants true friends who would stick to him regardless of the circumstances."

You groan. "Poor brat doesn't understand his place in society. Why doesn't he join us peons then?" You pause. "Let me guess, you're the friend in this mission, whilst I have to be the girlfriend."

"Your guess is correct," Igor smiles.

You groan again. "Figures. I'm the one who always has to play the damsel."

"Well, it's part of your special ability. Had you been able to remain a guy whilst using it, perhaps you could join me in some of the missions." You roll your eyes, knowing that your duties would always entail that.

"Is there at least any indication as to what type he likes?"

"According to data on his pornographic viewing habits collected by the NSA, he is mostly into..."
1223.title: The President is in desperate need of the TFPD

12231.content:
“Based in our projections we estimate his preferred female body type is that of the typical blonde bimbo. Large breasts, wide curves, etc.” Igor said going over the assignment with you.

“Well I have done seduction missions as bimbos in the past, making friends with a horny young man in his early 20’s should be a piece of cake.” You replied.

“Wait there is more here. The mission states we have to pose as students on the college campus where he is staying. We are to become his new world. I have to become his new best friend and you have to become his new girlfriend. We have to support and encourage him in whatever ways necessary to make sure he develops a solid social life and passes his remaining classes and graduates this summer..” Igor said.

“Wait...Fall quarter just started and summer quarter won’t end till August. That means we will be stuck in these bodies for almost a full year!” You said in protest.

“That’s what the assignment says. If the son fails school it will show very badly on the president who is running for re-election next year. He has promised to fully fund the TPD is this mission is a success for the remainder of his term.” Igor said.

“So...This isn’t so much a mission as a bribe...Get my kid a life and through school and I will make sure you are funded. This is why I hate curropt politics.” You said angry.

“I’m afraid so...The director of the TPD has already agreed to the mission and assigned us. It’s our mission now. You ready for this?” Igor said.

“Easy for you to say. You just to lose a few years and become a hot college guy again. I get to bring out my buxom bimbo look. I’ve never spent this long transformed as the opposite gender before. Are the TPD scientists sure it’s safe?” You asked.

“We haven’t heard anything negative. If anything comes up HQ will alert us. Shall we begin?” Igor asked.

“Yes...see you on the other side partner...” You said with a heavy sigh. The things you do to protect your job and department really pushes your limits before but this was on a whole new level.

Heading to your private room you opened up your private black briefcase you kept locked and hidden under your bed.

Opening the case inside was a variety of transformation pills all labeled and colored for the varied types of women you had to become in your line of work.

Transformation into another gender was a serious process that caused severe strain on the body and mind for most. It took years of training for you to adapt to it and even still the process took its toll on you. That’s why you were selected for the girlfriend role. Not many agents could handle such a task.

You took the bright pink pill labeled “Bimbo” and shook it to activate the nanomachines inside. You only did this form rarely and it had been years since your last time in this form.

Taking the pill you swallowed it whole as you waited for the transformation...

A few minutes later your body was burning as it was twisting and turning as it changed shape rapidly. Huge breasys erupted from your chest as long brigjt blonde hair grew from your scalp. Your body shrunk as your hips widened and skin turned smooth. After a few minutes you laid there panting as you stood up and saw your new reflection.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/d3/ce/49/...

You looked like a playboy model like this...You were more sexualized than ever before with this form.

“For the mission...” You said in your new seductive voice as you began to plan and get ready for your mission.
12231.title: "...buxom, bimbo bombshells."

choices: Belinda meets some of the girls when her shift finishes...
Belinda finds out about some specific requirements for the job.
Belinda's boss appears, she's impressed with her work and professionalism.
Belinda spots some suspicious data in the computer.
123.content:
You had worked undercover as a temp secretary for a while to build up your resumé/disguise and ensure you weren't caught out by the jobs required. As a TFPD officer you were intelligent and flexible, but the constant low-level sexism you faced in each of the companies where you worked was depressing.

Finally, you'd heard from your liaison officer of the vacancy you'd been waiting for. The receptionist at 'The Bunny Hutch', was open once again. Working as a receptionist in a legal brothel wasn't what most secretaries would consider impressive in their work history. However, as a temp it was meant to be a step up for Belinda, as Barry had chosen to name his new persona.

Belinda Miami, had a convincing set of IDs and paperwork and now a convincing real background that could withstand scrutiny by the sleazier section of society.

Despite the legalisation of prostitution it was still a seedy business even as it tried to disguise itself as executive services. The job was still a cover for people and drug smuggling.

Belinda looked down at her bust as she adjusted her bra.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/16/f7/88/...

It was getting to be a too familiar sight. She'd designed this body to appeal, and laughed as she gave herself a significant bust... Now the joke was literally on her! She wanted a bust... an arrest so she could move onto another case.

- - - - -

She made herself presentable and respectable, checking her outfit for wrinkles as she stood before the intimidating building. She wasn't applying to be one of the girls. Thank God, she thought with a shudder.

The interview passed in a blur, with remarkably little competition. Just as she'd suspected none of the other candidates were so enthusiastic to win the job. Given her recent experience it was understandable. But, Belinda presented herself as if she were taking it as a step upwards. She was getting a permanent full-time job and security and leaving behind the insecure temping life.

By the next day, she was being shown her work position and the computer booking system. The details of the customers requests and special preferences in a spreadsheet. Her stomach knotted, and bile rose in her throat as she considered some of those acts.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/0c/2e/1a/...

It was impossible not to imagine herself as the woman in these fantasies. Some elaborate and very precise, with some very specific instructions. Others only a few guidelines for how he wanted her dressed, and some ways to act, or just particular lines to inspire them.

- - - - -

It was high-end, Belinda found out, as the customers arrived. Looking professional and well-presented, they were not the street scum that preyed on the girls on street corners, or just worked the lower end of this world.

She was surprised with the respect she received, each customer was polite, some even complimentary. None even 'complimented' her by saying she was pretty enough to book herself.
123.title: Finally, a step forward...

13.content:
Investigating the aftermath a case that came across Detective Spinosa's wouldn't be pretty. All law enforcement dealt with awful things but her department got the ones where no rational explanation applied. Looking at the poor twisted creature in the cell she felt only pity. A creature that might be called a minotaur in ancient Greece stared at her. A genetic splicing freak that now could not contain its fits of rage. Every so often he would bash his head against the metal bars to no effect.

Spinosa hoped the techs could get the auto translater to figure out if the noises it made meant anything. She didn't even know if it was originally human or not. She glared at it looking for some sentience in the eyes when it ran up and repeated its cycle of bashing its head against the cage. The detective just shook her head and moved on without flinching.

She meandered to her office wondering where to start. Several files lay strewn on her desk. What rabbit hole should she explore today. Spinosa opened a small file on the right side of her desk revealing the photo of young woman and her baby. Only the picture deceived for upon perusal the file revealed the baby to be the young ladies husband. A man who suddenly began deaging and only stabilized when he reached infancy. The cause remained unknown. She flipped the file shut opening another.

One file she didn't bother opening she knew it well. A series of human cyborgs kept getting discovered. Most with their brains fried. and those that were found alive remembered nothing of their experience. Probably because whatever twisted scientist did it to them knew their cybernetics were burning out. All the cyborgs could be traced to a missing person who previously had no cybernetics. This left many questions like what they were being used for? And who was attaching the cybernetics.

A red file held special interest to the eminent Doctor Yamato who wished to understand the procedure used on the victim. Looking at the picture of a gorgeous well endowed teenager whose prints revealed an identity of an eighty year old man. The Doctor wished to know if it was nanites, surgery, some combination or something else. Well she better make a decision before Chief Haywood got upset.
13.title: Criminal investigation

choices: Wait for the results of the tests
On second thoughts, let Yamato do his examinations, focus on a different case
133.content:
The police had found her wandering the streets, half-dressed and in a delirious state, and had placed her in a cell for the night to sleep off whatever narcotic was assumed to be in her system. She was gorgeous, with curves in all the right places, and the cops had initially assessed her as yet another wayward young woman fallen to prostitution and drugs. The station saw no end of their ilk.

Yet in the morning, she was no more lucid. She just rambled incoherently. She couldn't give them a place of residence or even a name that made sense, and when asked basic questions like what year it was or who was president, the 'Jane Doe' had given answers like "1955" or "Eisenhower". When pressed, she had become angry and confused, and lashed out at one of the interviewers. For all her beauty, she had a mean right hook.

The police ran through a number of likely theories. They tested her for alcohol, which came back negative, and sent off a sample of her blood to be checked for drugs. When she failed to sober up, they began to suspect she was a drug mule, that most likely a package of narcotics smuggled in her gut was leaking into her system. She was rushed to hospital for an X-ray. To their confusion, the x-ray revealed that underneath her pretty exterior, she was sporting bilateral prosthetic hip replacements, was fitted with a pacemaker, and that her bones showed signs of osteoporosis, osteoarthritis, and repeated breaking and rehealing.

Then the results of the blood tests came in. They were very positive, except instead of recreational substances like cocaine or heroine, it was a cocktail of the sort of medication you'd expect to see in a pensioner - drugs for treating hypertension, heart arrhythmia, Alzheimer's and the like.

They suspected that the woman had been poisoned, and opened an investigation. Finally they ran her fingerprints, and that's when things got even stranger. With 99.9% certainty, the database came back with a match... for an 80 year old man.

Detective Spinosa looked over the matched ID in the folder. Mr Donald Watkins. Born 22 May, 1936. Retired accountant. His only criminal record came from four years ago, when an altercation with his wife had alarmed a neighbour enough for them to call the police. Mr Watkins had been brought in to the station and his prints taken, though his wife gave a statement explaining that Donald often became agitated on account of his dementia, and that she would not be pressing charges.

Baffled, the police had finally done the sensible thing and contacted the FBI. The FBI took one look at it and forwarded it to the TFPD.

The mysterious Jane Doe had been transferred to a comfortable waiting cell in the basement of TFPD headquarters. Spinosa had requested further tests including a DNA analysis before she allowed Doctor Yamato in on this. Yamato wasn't known for his bedside manner, and there was no need to have him poking and prodding and terrifying her interview subject before it was absolutely necessary.

Spinosa considered her options...
133.title: find out about the teenager

1331.content:
The interview with Ms Jane Doe (or what was quite possibly Mr Donald Watkins) could wait until the test results came back from forensics. Spinosa set the file aside and headed to the canteen.

A brown envelope was waiting in the in-tray when she returned from lunch, the word Urgent written on the front. The contents were a printout of densely worded scientific jargon summarizing dozens of gene sequences and blood components. She flipped through to the summary.

Sample: haem, Ms Jane Doe#3397
Semblance: Human, caucasian, female, ?late teens
Presentation: found streets in confused state
Results: Y-chromosome positive. Nanobots negative. Gynemorphic drugs negative. Oestrogen levels are 700% the expected norm for a woman of this age. Telomere shortening and rheumatoid factor suggestive of advanced age.
Summary: Likely surgical and hormonal alteration of geriatric male.
URGENT: Assesment of LFTs and biomarkers are indicative of late-stage liver and renal failure. If 'Jane Doe' is currently unmedicated, recommend immediate hospitalization. REPEAT: HOSPITALISE IMMEDIATELY

Crap! It hadn't even occurred to her that Jane Doe was three days off her meds! Quickly Spinosa leaped to her feet and dashed through the station, taking the flights of stairs to the basement three at a time. She badged herself past the electronic doors and hurried to "Jane"'s cell.

Yet it was empty. An unpleasant odour greeted her nose and a janitor was mopping up a brown smear on the floor.

"What's going on? Where's Jane?"

"Had a little bit of accident," the janitor said breezily. "Poor girl couldn't get to the toilet in time."

"You mean she-" Spinosa wrinkled her nose. "-soiled herself?"

"When you gotta go, you gotta go," the Janitor smiled.

"Where is she now?"

"Officer Brandon took her to get cleaned up. Taking his time getting her back though..." he said with a frown.

It didn't take a great application of her detective skills to find where Officer Brandon had taken "Jane". A thin brown trail ran out through the door, along the corridor and to the shower facilities that stood next the cells. She couldn't help but feel pity for the poor "Jane", what she had no doubt was this Donald Watkins. Somebody out there had taken this poor, confused old man and methodically, surgically cut-apart and mutilated him into the shape of a fetching young woman. For what end, she couldn't say for certain, but she'd seen enough in this job to make an educated guess. She couldn't even begin to fathom what he must be going through, how confused he must be.

The trail led to the far cubicle. On the other side of the door she could hear the sound of a running shower. There was no sign of Officer Brandon. She tried the handle. It was locked. An uneasy feeling began to form in the pit of her stomach. Brandon was a rookie - the typical ambitious, hypermasculine meathead that tended to got filtered out in their first year. Hoping against hope, she pressed her ear against the door.

"-oh yeah. Oh yeeaah. Dirty girl. Mmm. You just can't help yourself, can you, you dirty, ugh, dirty, filthy girl," came the lustful, breathless grunts of Officer Brandon.

"Shit!" Spinosa hammered against the door. "Openthisdoorrightnowwhateveritisyou'redoingintherefuckingstopitorIswear togodIwillbreakthisdoordown!" Hearing no reply, she took a step back, braced herself, and kicked in the door.

'Jane''s scant clothes were bundled with up atop a police uniform just inside the door. Officer Brandon was cursing loudly as he desperately tried to extricate himself from Donald Watkin's pussy. They stood naked beneath the shower. "Jane" was turned towards the wall, legs spread, hands flat against the tiles, water pouring down her arched back. Brandon stood behind her, balls deep in her pussy, his hands gripping her in such a way that it was obvious to Spinosa that he was the only thing holding "her" up. Donald looked near to collapse. Her knees were shaking, her breath came in worryingly ragged gasps, and her face looked ashen.

"I can explain!" Brandon gasped, sliding his turgid, dripping manhood free and trying to conceal it with his hand. "She came onto me. She...she kept grabbing onto me."

"That's because he can barely stand up by himself!"

"B-but she was drooling all over me."

"Because he's an eighty-fucking-years-old pensioner with dementia, you idiot!"

"Wh-what! Look you can't tell anybody about this! It was a mistake. I just got this job. They'll take my badge-"

"You think they'll just have your badge for this?" Spinosa roared. She grabbed a towel and moved to wrap it around the poor ex-man's slender shoulders. Yet as she did, Jane's grey eyes went suddenly wide she clutched her chest. Her whole body seemed to seize up, then go limp, and she hit the floor with a wet, hard smack.

"Oh fuck oh fuck oh fuck." Spinosa knelt beside her. "Can you hear me?! Jane- I mean, Mr Watkins? Donald? Can you..." Her voice trailed away as she searched for a pulse, and felt nothing...
1331.title: Wait for the results of the tests

choices: Making some aesthetic upgrades to Bernard
Replacing more of the skeleton with remote controllable parts
Returning to the 'research facility' to play with his other patients
13314.content:
Doctor Mandeville placed both palms on the doors and pushed, bursting in to the family waiting area with his surgical gown billowing about him. The family looked up in alarm and pale-faced worry, but that quickly turned to joy at the Doctor's cry of "success! The surgery was a complete success!"

The daughter, whatever-her-name-was (he never bothered to learn the patients' names, there were so many of them) rose from her seat and came to grip his hands in her own, wrinkled own, thanking him profusely. Doctor Mandeville assured her that her gratitude was needless, that he only got into this line of work for the selfless act of helping others, and could she redirect her praise to the clinic's facebook or twitter pages where other clients could see it.

The granddaughter, a far more comely girl in her 30s, asked "when can we go in to see him?"

"Hm? See who?" Mandeville beamed.

"Uh, grandfather. The man you've just been operating on."

"Oh, right of course!" the Doctor beamed, spinning on his heel. He stared down the corridor, confused for a moment at its emptiness, before remembering the remote in his pocket. It was the size of a TV remote and covered in buttons that governed all sorts of functions - except instead of 'volume' or 'channel', these buttons controlled things like 'pace' and 'gait'. He pressed the 'home' button.

The swing doors at the far end of the corridor swung open. A silver-haired old man in a surgical gown emerged and walked towards them, his gait unsteady, a little mechanical perhaps, but remarkable for a man who, until yesterday, had been so riddled with arthritis as to be bedbound. "Remarkable! Truly remarkable!" crowed Bernard, staring at his own legs with incredulity.

The family erupted into cries of surprise and awe. "Bernard, you're walking!" cries the man's elderly wife, looking like she might collapse.

"That I am, my dear! Why, I daresay I could dance if I wanted."

Mandeville beamed. Happy to oblige, he thumbed the 'Dance' button on the remote. Bernard suddenly broke into an animated jig, skipping and jumping about the clinic's corridors like an Irish dancer. He finished with an acrobatic leap. Bernard could barely believe his own eyes. He clutched his chest, wheezing from the exertion, even though it was the servomotors in the joints that had done 95% of the work. "Warn me next time you do that, Doctor," Bernard puffed.

"How is this even possible?" the granddaughter cried.

"Oh, it's nothing really. Jesus was making the lame walk two thousand years ago, I've just improved on his work is all," Mandeville said humbly. "It's really not much more than a standard hip and knee replacement really. The only difference is that we replace the entire joint, not with a prosthetic joint but with a servomotor equivalent. It's useful in cases where the muscles have atrophied beyond the ability to manipulate the joint - really the motors are doing all the work, your grandfather is just along for the ride."

"And what a ride it is! I've never seen him this happy. We can't thank you enough. Are you sure you don't want any payment?"

He waved away her comments. "The only payment I need is the joy on my patients' faces. Aaand of course we will be housing your grandfather in our facility for the next few months while we perform tests to judge the efficacy of this groundbreaking treatment. In exchange for waiving the $320,000 fees."

"Of course, we completely understand. What sort of tests will you be doing?"

"Seeing how the patient adapts. Checking his mobility, and balance more importantly. These devices are to be fitted in very frail patients - we can't have them falling over due to improperly calibrated motors or glitchy software." He pressed a button to make Bernard swivel on the spot, and gestured to the gap in the surgical gown where a gnarly, fresh surgical scar could be seen running from the old man's coccyx to his lower thoracic vertebrae. "We had to take out most of the lower spinal column to replace with the motors and computer hub that detects and maintains balance. That is the main section we're concerned about - how it interfaces with the legs and how it compensates with the movement of the limbs of the natural body." He sucked air through his teeth, like a plumber about to add an extra zero to a tricky job. "That's the tricky part - having only half of a mechanised skeleton. The machine half has to compensate for the unpredictability of the human remains. There's a possibility we might need to fully replace the shoulder and elbow joints if that becomes a problem."

"Is that likely to happen?"

"Who can say," Mandeville replied, the flicker of a wicked smirk tweaking the edge of his mouth. "Who can say."

"Are we able to visit him at least?"

"I'm afraid that's out of the question. The clinic is completely sealed to outside eyes. This is cutting edge work we're doing here after all. You understand, yes?" The grand-daughter looks crestfallen at his words, but fortunately Mandeville has never been burdened with an excess of empathy. He claps his hands sharply, and jabs the remote at Bernard like a parent switching off the children's TV at bedtime. "That's enough for today. Our patient needs his rest after all. Say goodbye, Bernard!"

"'Ere, I 'adn't finished talkin' to them yet," Bernard remarked indignantly as his legs began to frog march him down the corridor, away from his family.

"Oh, I'm sure you'll see them again, Bernard," Mandeville lied, walking a few paces behind his patient. After they turned a corner, he eagerly tapped a few settings on the remote.

The servomotor skeleton of metal and plastic whined as the joints that had once been the old man's hips shifted into a new configuration, switching the previously stiff gait into a smooth, swaying motion, the old man's saggy ass cheeks sashaying from side to side with each mincing, feminine stride. The ramrod straight spine angled forward into a smooth curve, forcing the backside to jut out proudly. The ankle servomotor joints tightened, lifting the feet on to tiptoes, as if the man was wearing invisible stiletto shoes.

Bernard twigged immediately that something is different, though naturally he had no way of guessing that his doctor had given him the gait of a broad-hipped catwalk model, and he would have been powerless to do anything about it if he had - the motors were 10x more powerful than anything the geriatric's atrophied muscles could muster. Mandeville relished the intoxicating feeling of power watching the unfortunate man strut himself for the Doctor's personal enjoyment.
13314.title: Meanwhile...

135.content:
Spinosa failing to pick in time with the Chief’s ominous footsteps approaching. “Just about to pick Chief.” She said hoping to cut off a terse reprimand.

Chief Haywood shook her head, “Change of plans you are going to do a talk.”

“Can’t Olson do it? He normally loves those soft ball assignments.” Spinosa said unenthusiastic about talking to a bunch college kids.

“Faculty asked not to have him back after being too attentive to the female students.” Haywood said, “You are up. Don’t be late.” Tossing a sheet with details of time and place. She left Spinosa to gather the lecture material. Spinosa understood that it helped keep them ingratiated with the scientific community. It occasionally led to recruits. An added benefit of keeping the public informed. But Spinosa simply hated public speaking.

Gene fiddling with the wiring harness trying to trouble shoot the problem. Professor Weiler told him the genetic synthesizer kept cutting out during critical portions of analysis. Probably overtaxing the computer but they paid him to make sure of and run diagnostics. The fine layer of dust inside definitely gave him an idea that maintenance and basic care might be at fault for any malfunctions. Shrugging his shoulders figuring he got paid by the hour it didn’t matter. With goggles and a mask on, battling dust bunnies a hazard of the job.

Exiting out scratching his head thinking over a mental check list. Double checking cord connections…check. Replacing any frayed wires…check. Individual systems functioning…check. Nervously he decided to power up the whole machine to see how it ran together. A humming noise sounding the device springing to life. No explosions the first good sign he laughed. Moving over to the chamber entering to make sure the injector powered up. Satisfied that the back light showed green he ran his eyes down the tubing. Rolling his eyes at finding specimen vials screwed in. They probably congealed not being refrigerated. Clogging up the tubing causing all of the problems. Unscrewing the vials he deposited them in a biohazard container.

Returning to the chamber to clear out the lines the injector activated. Laser guided targeting sighting him in. It stuck him in the arm. After pulling free Gene rubbing his wound. Next heading to the first aid kit washing it clean and putting a band-aid atop it. Shutting off the machine shaking his head. He didn’t put it into targeting mode. It must have been left activated when turned off. His removing of the vials clearing the blockage enough to operate. Reminding himself that no deadly disease research only basic genetic research and trying to gain better understanding of the building blocks of life.

Flushing the lines he forgot his injury. He wrote up a note asking the professor to check the programming because injector fired off without a set target and of the vials being left in the machine. Gene locked up the lab and headed to class. His side work paid well and got him access to many professors notoriously dismissive of student interaction. If you could fix their equipment they often came to you. Classes passed without any incident. Gene slipped in on a visiting Tfpd officer doing a guest lecture on ethics in transformation and the hardships of the job.

The officer sharing fascinating and often graphic pictures of the misuse and abuse of science. A man subjected to a growth ray that caused his head to rapidly enlarge till it snapped his neck. A woman trying to achieve a young look found themselves deaging mentally and physically stuck as a toddler. Sports stars looking for an edge falling prey to illicit options. All of the examples going horribly wrong. One boxer attempting to get a granite jaw found himself little more than a statue. A memorable transformation that made headlines Arthur “The Arm” Macnally. Throwing a deep pass during a game on live TV his arm elongated several feet before it flopped to the ground. Medical staff coiled it atop him as they carried him off the field. Never played a game again. In an interview he talked about shoulder and arm issues. He thought he would get a few years in with his treatment but he ended up needing to have it amputated.

After the lecture Gene grabbing a card from the officer wiping his sweaty brow. He must be coming down with something. Back to his room his vision blurred. It cleared with his head throbbing. He thought back on it injection his churning stomach guiding him to the toilet. Regurgitating remnants of his last meal. Standing on his wobbly feet attempting to reach his cell phone. Gene’s eyes rolling back as he fell on the carpet.
135.title: another assignment

choices: Training the latest kennel of police dogs
14.content:
Life as an officer of the TFPD isn't all shootouts and car chases. Much of the time is spent on more mundane duties, like filing reports and analysing forensic information brought in from the field. The TFPD conducts a number of outreach programs, both to the general public and other law-enforcement agencies, making them aware of some of the dangerous TF technology on the streets.

Today you are...
14.title: Other departments

142.content:
The Kennels a place for the Tfpd K9 unit the select few. Other Tfpd officers thought they were a bunch of dog walkers. Any officers that spent time there found how tough the unit really was and would get the scars to prove it. Frequent visitors to Doctor Yamato the job often involved brutal tasks taking down beasts and monsters others couldn't.

Lieutenant Bryson led the unit with military discipline. He didn't tolerate fooling around or lack of awareness. A tall well muscled man with a synth skin covering portions of skin where the minotaur gored him. This is why he regularly tested those under him to make sure nothing could surprise them. With the strange creatures they faced Bryson tried to keep them on their toes. The only gentleness his officers saw in him was to the canines in their unit. He knew they wouldn't lose their edge if he showed them kindness. He cared for the members of the unit but worried about getting close in a tough job.

Bryson currently walked down the batch of new dogs sent down for training. They sat obediently awaiting the next command. A mixture of dogs made the line up to fit in with varied needs of the K9 unit. Hounds that could track almost anything, guard dogs whose obedience over road fear of whatever they were tasked to take down. Even some smaller dogs to go after smaller targets.

He began having some officers taking individual dogs through their paces while he observed. He needed to weed out those that couldn't obey before they went through an expensive enhancement process. Genetic and cybernetic processes to help the dogs better perform up to the stresses of the Tfpd. Sadly few dogs would reach retirement due to the dangers of the job and the strain the enhancements did to their bodies.

Out of the corner of Bryson's eye he saw one of the German Shepard's go into a fit. He called out, "Call Dr Harrison and let her know we have a dog having a seizure." He ran over to the dog which twitched of the on the with drool formed a puddle on the ground. He lifted it noticing a lot of fur fall to ground as he hurried to the door. As he moved the dog began to gain weight. Bryson looked down to see that all of the hair fallen off the dog. He stared as the paws grew into hands. The tips extending out as the claws became clear and flattened over them. Bryson didn't know what was happening but knew he couldn't help the fragile creature in his arms so he continued to Dr Harrison's office.

Dr Harrison maintained an office and laboratory in the sizable headquarters. Top of his class in biology and trained as a veterinarian she came to the department to further his understanding of the possibilities for genetic enhancement. He loved the fascinating cases that came across his table. He enjoyed trying to work out how to reverse the transformations. The liberty he was given with no fear of being put in prison for his experimentations made this job ideal.

Dr Harrison looked in excitement at the creature Bryson brought to him. A strange mixture of human and dog it took a minute to realize shape was changing before his eyes. The snout shrank back into a human shape. The black nose turned into a light pink color angling into a straight small nose. Brunette Hair poured from the head hanging down across the now human features. A feminine face who moaned in pain but showed no other sign of wakefulness. Bryson laid the body on the table asking, "Can you do something for her pain."

"I am going to attach a neural inhibitor that should help. It will numb any pain she is feeling. I got a call about a German Shepard having seizures is this it?" Dr Harrison place a half circle metallic device with suctions at the ends that he attached to the temples of the creature.

Bryson answered, "It is the same dog have you seen anything like this before?" He calmed down slightly seeing the female stop seizing and relax as the inhibitor took effect.

"I have seen splicing victims before but only after the fact. I have watched confiscated video of the procedures being done but never without equipment controlling the rate and maintaining the vital signs of the subject. This must be some new technology that I am unaware of. I wonder if she is a dog or a human reverting back? Where did you pick her up from?" He took out wireless sensor and attached it between her budding breasts. On either side a circular portion of the skin darkened into nipples that hardened in the cool air of the exam room. The nipples on her stomach faded into her skin.

"We have a service that does basic training with the dogs and then brings them in if they think they are ready. They purchase them from reputable breeders'. I will have to check my records to find out where she was purchased." Bryson looked away feeling embarrassed to look at the naked young woman.

The woman's breasts filled out taking on a modest size. She began to wake stretching out her now shapely legs. She opened her dark brown eyes to Bryson's turned back.
142.title: Training the latest kennel of police dogs

choices: Dr. Yamato helps Dr Harrison run tests
1421.content:
The young woman sat up on the table while Dr. Harrison watched with fascination while loading a syringe with a sedative. The veterinarian wished to know how much intelligence the now human had he said, “Can you understand me? We mean you no harm.”

At the sound of Dr. Harrison’s voice, she turned to face him. She made no vocal sounds just stared at the source. Bryson turned back to face the Dr. Harrison and the woman shocked to find the girl awake. He grabbed a lab coat placing it on the woman’s shoulders to give her some modesty. Startled she bit his hand. He pulled away quickly realizing his foolishness. The doctor stuck her with the sedative during her distraction. She twisted around leaping at Dr. Harrison causing him to reel back stumbling a bit before falling on the hard floor. The young woman clumsily missed disoriented by the medication. She stopped suddenly giving a curious look to Dr. Harrison. She tried to stay awake groggily she spoke out, “Who are you?” before succumbing to the medication. She slept quietly on the cool floor with Bryson observing with drawn stun gun waiting for any movement.

“You think she might’ve been human originally Dr. Harrison?” Bryson asked while he kept his stun gun trained on the slumped figure on the floor. Blood dripped from his hand as he said, “You need any help with the restraints? Dang, this is the sloppiness I try to drill out of my people.” Bryson looked down at his hand shaking his head. He walked over to a cabinet picking out a can of synth skin spraying it on leaving sheen to his flesh.

Dr. Harrison lifted the petite girl back on the exam table and activate the restraints. Dr. Harrison said, “Could you contact Doctor Yamato and see if he is available? I think he might like a look at her if he has the time. Don’t beat yourself up, this was hardly an expected development. I will run some tests and give you call when I know more.”

“Okay, I might head out after the call. I want to make some checks on my end.” Bryson said as he pulled his cell phone to call Dr. Yamato.
1421.title: she bites Bryson

143.content:
An Indian man in a crumpled shirt and tie stands outside the sliding doors of the hospital, smoking a cigarette with several pack's-worth of stubs already littering the pristine paving stones around him. He looks you up and down as you limp closer. Last week you twisted your left ankle trying to chase down a dealer and it is still tender. For all the benefits of the amnion implant, it has left your muscles weak and your joints laxer than they should be.

"If you want A&E, we don't officially open until 9am," the man grumbles. "You'd best hobble on over to the old building. Might even meet a real doctor if you're quick."

"I hear they're an endangered species these days," you reply, flashing your badge. He straightens a little, stubbing out his cigarette. "Officer Haywood. I'm from the police. I'm just here to oversee the opening of the new infirmary."

"Should I be worried?"

"We just want to make sure everything goes off without a hitch," you reply with the smile you reserve for civilians. "The world's first fully-automated hospital going online. You've got a lot of high tech on display, over a billion dollars in robotics in one building alone. That sort of money tends to draw attention."

"And the latest in security measures too. I'm not the only one set to be out of a job soon," he says to you with a grim smile. He extends a hand for you to shake. "Doctor Gurdeep Singh." Now it's your turn to look him up and down. The guy looks a mess, unshaven, eyes bloodshot as though he's been drinking for days, shirt flapping in the breeze. If he works here, he stands in stark contrast to the gleaming modern hospital. Definitely a man long passed giving a fuck.

He rummages in his jeans and pulls out an ID badge, the smiling, shaven photograph on the front evidently from happier times. "I'll let you in. About all I'm good for these days, a doorman."

He swipes his badge and the doors slide open to reveal the foyer, all marble and polished metal and glass. You're about the step inside when the floor begins to slide under your feet and you are smoothly conveyed forward towards the reception desk. Dr Singh curses loudly as he and his collection of cigarette buts are conveyed alongside you. What first looks to be a flat, grey rat scurries across the floor and begins to hoover up the detritus around him.

In many ways it resembles an airport check-in. There are dozens of monitors set-up all the way down the length of the long desk. When opened and at capacity, this hall will be processing thousands of patients per day, though currently it is deserted aside for the sanitation robot now spraying down the region around Gurdeep with antiseptic. The conveyor belt splits, sending the doctor to one monitor, while you to another. He waves his badge angrily at the monitor and it swings aside to allow him entry to the other side of the desk with a remark of "Welcome to the Automated Infirmary, Mister Singh."

"Doctor Singh. Doctor! I thought IT said they were fixing that!" he whines.

The monitor before you trills. "Good morning and welcome to the Automated Infirmary. You are currently in the Accident and Emergency department. What is the nature of the medical emergency? Alternatively, if you are scheduled for a clinic appointment or day case operation, please select so on the screen."

"Didn't they give you your own badge?" the Doctor asks, wandering over on the other side of the desk. You shake your head. "Just choose anything and it'll let you through. I can swipe you in anywhere you want to go."

You look at the options on the screen...
143.title: Out on patrol

choices: "Welcome Rachel James, Thank you for choosing us for your "Breast Augmentation"
"Welcome Richard Adams, Thank you for choosing us for your "Gender Reassignment"
1432.content:
You do as he says just picking the top item on the list.

The Door Slides open. and Moving Walkway jerks you forward and the door opens before Doctor Singh even needs to let you in and you as you hear a Calming Voice.

"Welcome to the Automated Infirmary... PATIENT NAME Missing Thank You For Choosing us for Your... Appointment Details Missing...

"Seems like it could still use some work..." you yell to Doctor Singh as his own moving walkway moves him slowly further from you.

"Yeah Guess IT wasn't too Thorough, I'll log that..." you see him pass behind a wall while you are escorted somewhere else.

"Should I be Worried?" you yell assuming he's nearby...but there's no reply... "Doctor Singh...

The Pathway slows and seems to shift until it once again looks like normal floor Tiles.

"Welcome PATIENT NAME Missing.... Welcome PATIENT NAME Missing... Welcome PATIENT NAME Missing

"Doctor Singh! You yell again, looking around, whichever path you entered from has vanished, no doors or anything, just a sealed room, the same technology that hides the pathways... The Calming Voice continues on a loop until suddenly pausing.

"Gurdeep!" you yell again, getting a bit worried.

144.title: Narcotics department

choices: Marcus has more questions for the current victim
1441.content:
Detectives Erik Jameson and his partner Marcus Tanner were interviewing a suspect in a new narcotics case. They were in an interview room with a beautiful red headed woman wearing a guys outfit.

“Start at the beginning...what happened?” Detective Jameson said.

The woman was nervous and not speaking very fluently as her mind seemed all over the place.

“It’s just...you know how it is right? You are at a party...you meet a hot girl and she wants to try something new. I’d never done it as a chick before and she wanted to switch things up. She hands me a pill and I turn into...this...We then had the best sex in my life but....when morning came I was still like this...Now I’m starting to feel things...urges...desires. I want to go shopping...I wanna look sexy...I think you are super cute and....” The woman said as she was interrupted.

“That’s enough...We get the picture.” Detective Tanner said holding up his hand.

The two detectives left the room as they drank their coffee trying to figure this out.

“This is the third case this month....We have a permanently feminized subject showing signs of mental feminization as well.” Erik said to his partner.

“It has to be something new...All the legal feminization drugs have a 12 hour change limit built into them mandated by the FDA. Mental changes are also strictly forbidden. Do you think the rumors of Efemoral are true?” Marcus asked back.

Efemoral was the base drug used in all feminization products. It rewrites the DNA to become a highly sexualized female. The distribution and control of Efemoral is highly secret and it never hits the streets. That’s because it’s raw form Efemoral is too potent for a normal person. It causes permanent transformations that also affect the mind often causes the subject to lose their memories and become a total over sexualized female.

This is why legal feminization products take the Efemoral and cut it and dilute it down to ensure the transformations are always temporary and never affect the mind.

However word on the street was a couple months ago a government supply truck was attacked by cartel gangsters and its cargo taken. That would mean there was an untold supply of uncut Efemoral running around somewhere.

As Erik and Marcus spoke another TFPD officer showed up looking for them.

“Detectives....we have another one...transformed female saying she was a male but hasn’t been able to turn back. However this time she claims to not have taken any TF drugs at all...” The officer said.

“Forceful transformations...this is getting worse...I will question the new victim see what you can get out this one.” Erik said as Marcus nodded.
1441.title: Efemerol - a feminising synthetic hormone

14412.content:
Marcus returned to the victim, finding her unbuttoning her shirt. He made sure to keep his eyes above neck level. "We can turn the air con on if you're warm."

"It's just these clothes. They're so constricting," she murmured, squirming in her seat.

Marcus made a note, wondering if the rejection of male clothing was a sign of mental change or if her new proportions were simply badly matched to her male attire. "We have some clothes that you can change into if you'd like. We're going to assign you a transition counselor, somebody who can help you through this. They can help you find things that fit." For the first time, the victim's demeanor brightened noticeably at the mention of chosing clothing. Definitely some mental degradation, he noted. "They can also work you through changing your ID with the appropriate databases. Though we don't recommend it, we do understand if you would prefer to keep your changes from friends and family. If you decide on it, we can assist in establishing a new identity for yourself, though if this is something you'd like to consider, you need to decide now rather than later."

The victim's lip wobbled, tears coming to her eyes. "So there's no way of changing me back?"

"That remains to be seen. If it is uncut efemerol we're dealing with... then no, but there are other substances on the streets that could reproduce these effects, and there's a chance those might begin to wear off in a few days or weeks. In the meantime, we're going to do everything we can to catch the creep that did this. I'd like to go over your description of the woman you met. Do you remember anything specific about her, anything that might help us identify her?"

The woman thought. "She was tall for a woman. Like my height-"

"Your height as a man?" She nodded, glances down at herself as she realised her reduced stature for the first time. "Which was?"

"6'1". And she had a tattoo on her shoulder, kinda like a knot."

Marcus pushed his notepad and pen across the table, and she did her best scribbling in from memory a type of celtic knot symbol. Her brown furrowed as she read the note above - "hey, what's this about 'mental changes'?" she said, looking at him with wide, terrified eyes.

"Stay focused on the woman for a minute. Did she have an accent or way of speaking?"

"No. I don't know. Maybe european. Irish maybe, or Scottish. What 'mental changes'? What's happening to me? I keep thinking these thoughts, only they're not my thoughts. I keep thinking about... dicks. Why can't I stop thinking about dicks? Oh god, what's happening to me? I don't want to be a woman. I want to be a man." Tears had begun to run down her cheeks, and Marcus quickly retrieved his notes before they became waterlogged. Confronted with the outburst of tears, he shifted uncomfortably. There were people at the station who had received years of training on how to help victims of forced feminization, but Marcus wasn't one of them. He preferred working with facts, not people, and especially not women - or at least the sort of hyper-emotional parodies of women that overdoses of synthetic hormones tended to create.

For a few minutes he tried feebly to press on through the blubbering, but it was little use - the victim had begun to cry uncontrollably, questioning every thought that entered her head. Intrusive thoughts of female sexuality were beginning to overwhelm her, and it was apparent she was on the verge of a mental breakdown. Pushing back his chair, Marcus bid his leave. A maternal-looking counselor stepped into the interview room as he left.

Maybe in a few hours she would have calmed down enough to be of help again. For now, he had a few leads to go on. The celtic design was popular among the Irish mob in the city, or the small-scale dealers that associated with them, and would be a place to start. 6'1" wasn't outside the realm of possibility for a natural woman, though it was likely (particularly judging by the aggressiveness and voracious sexual appetite the victim had described of his assailant/lover) that she had originally been a man, and had simply been using a short-lasting drug to give herself temporary, superficial feminine characteristics, without sacrificing her height and strength. For the assailant, the effects would have worn off by now.

Assuming she, or he, hadn't taken another hit of efemerol. Or any of the other miriad chemicals on the black market capable of dramatically altering appearance.

He sighed. Working for the TFPD was never easy when the suspects could change their appearance from day to day.
14412.title: Marcus has more questions for the current victim

choices: Go question the company owner Jacob O’Brian Jr
Sneak into the plant and investigate
144121.content:
Marcus looked over his notes at his deck from the interview as his partner Erik came back from questioning the new victim.

“How did things go with the new victim?” Marcus asked not even looking up from his notepad.

“Not good...She was far too emotional. Definitely drugged. She was a pretty high up executive at this plastic manufacturer downtown. Sounds like someone spiked her coffee cause she said she was fine until a business meeting mid way through the day when the transformation hit her.” Erik said.

Marcus looked up from his notes a bit. “A plastic manufacturer? That’s nothing special, why target someone like that?”

“It sounds weird too. They make things like plastic baggies and hard plastic containers for food. I mean it’s not like they are some revolutionary company or anything.” Erik said.

Marcus’ eyes suddenly widened as he saw a connection somewhere.

“What was the name of the company?” Marcus said standing up.

Erik thought for a moment before looking back to his notes.

“Umm...O’Brian Plastics. Family owned company for over 40 years. Founder was an Irish immigrant Jacob O’Brian. Now his son Jacob Jr, runs it. Our victim was one of financial executives who had only been with the company for three years.” Erik said.

“That’s it! Our early victim swears she remembers seeing a Celtic knot tattoo on the girl she met at the party. I’m thinking there might be an Irish mob connection here.” Marcus said.

Erik thought about it for a moment. “Why the hit on the plastic company? You think the owner is dealing dirty with the mob?” He asked.

“Could be...However it could something else. You know uncut Efemoral is highly volatile right? If you wanted to transport a large enough supply of it you would need special plastic containers. What better place than local Irish company? Perhaps the mob reached out to them and they refused. This could be retaliation or blackmail.” Marcus noted.

“Maybe a chat with Jacob Jr is in order?” Erik said with a smile seeing this was their best lead.

“Or we could...sneak in and do little bit of investigating? See if their plant has any secrets to tell?” Marcus also suggested.

That sounded more dangerous but could lead to a bigger result....Thinking it over they decided to
144121.title: Look into the Irish connection

1443.content: Designer drugs have come a long way in the last few years, and dealers are threatening to flood the city with synthetic drugs.
1443.title: Narcotics department

choices: There is a TFPD agent undercover among the squats
Don't inhale Squat powder - it takes weeks to wear off
14432.content:
Detectives Erik Jameson and his partner Marcus Tanner sat in the back of the unmarked police van as it sped through the city streets. Marcus checked and rechecked his equipment, making sure that every buckle of his stab-vest was tightened, while Eric sat nonchalantly, his stab vest lying on the seat next to, regarding his partner with mild amusement.

"I've never seen anybody look so serious before one of these things. Have you ever raided a squat den before?"

"I've rounded up plenty of squatters before," Marcus replied seriously. "Those people are desperate and vicious, and they've always got shivs hidden somewhere. I'm not taking any chances, and neither should you."

"Not squatters, man. Squats. Did you miss the briefing or something?"

Shamefaced Marcus admitted that he had dozed through much of it, what with it being the last of six 14-hour-shifts. With somebody flooding the city with drugs, the TFPD had never been more in demand, which meant shifts had doubled and officers had to get their rest where they could find it.

Erik grinned widely from ear to ear. "Boy, are you in for a tree. Not every day you get to do your first squat raid. Okay, guess I'll go over the briefing again, so... Squat is a drug. The junkies that use Squat, we call them Squats, easy to get confused with squatters, I know, but there's a big distinction. Or, rather, a small distinction. Other names for Squat are Bonsai, PygmyUp, MiniMe, and a bunch of others."

The van was pulling into a rough part of town now, shuddering through the potholes on the crumbling roads. The buildings eeither side of the street began to show decay, graffiti and shattered windows. Hunting grounds for the TFPD.

"So, on it's own, Squat might not sound like much. What it does is it activates some gene somewhere, and it makes the user start shitting out their guts, basically. Morning, noon, and night, shit, shit, shit. It aint pretty. They don't eat much either. Anyway, all this shitting and not eating, they start to...?"

"...starve?" Marcus ventured, who looked aghast at the tale of shitting, wondering to himself if there was a limit to the type of filth these junkies could shove into their bodies.

"Wrong! They don't get thinner, instead they shrink! The activated Squat gene means that, as the body runs out of nutrition, it gets smaller to compensate. Everything shrinks - fat, muscle, even bone and brains! They grow in reverse, getting tinier and tinier, but their proportions stay the same. Eventually they become little miniature people."

Marcus was almost speechless, but it didn't help promotion prospects to look to surprised about new discoveries in the TFPD. Fellow officers started to look at you as if you're naive. "How small do they get? And what's the point?"

"There's really no lower limit. Most lose maybe a foot or two of height. With chronic usage, you might get abusers that are a foot high, or less. Who knows? This is fairly new on the market, the boys in the lab haven't exactly had time to study it, but I wouldn't be surprised if they just keep shrinking until they're just too small to put the handcuffs on. Maybe eventually they just float away on the wind, or get eaten by rats," he laughed.

"But why? Do they get some sort of high out of it?"

"No pun intended, right," Erik winked. "Nah, no high, at least not directly. The thing you have to understand is that there's very few Squat addicts in the world. None of the Squats take it because they want to. It's a simple question of weight rations. Y'see, if you make a man half the size, his weight is actually 1/8th of his original weight, on account of him being halved in three different dimensions. Half as high, half was wide, half the gut. And a person that is one 8th the mass requires only one 8th the food to eat, one 8th the water to drink, and one 8th the cocaine to get high."

"Ohh."

"That's why I said there aren't many Squat addicts. They take it because, to a serious Squat, a spliff can look like a goddamn tree. A baggy of cocaine is like a holdall stuffed with it. Most of these are serious addicts to other substances, and they take Squat because it allows them to afford their habits. They live like kings. Tiny, off-their-face kings."

Marcus looked down at his normal-sized handcuffs. "Wow, I was really not prepared for this mission. Next time I fall asleep in a brief, kick me. So what exactly can we expect?"

"Nothing too dangerous. It's not like these guys are going to be carrying around heavy weaponry - the worst you can expect is a cut from a dirty-blade and a trip to the doc for a tetanus shot. But there can be a lot of them. These Squat dens - typically they stick together for mutual safety, against other humans or even animals - so there can be upwards of a hundred squats living in a single house. It's kinda funny really when you see these places - most of them live in cardboard boxes, some even in doll houses, and they're like mansions to them. Most of the time they'll have at least one normal-sized person there to look after them, somebody who can actually go out, buy food and score them all drugs without worrying about getting trodden on. He should be the only one you need to worry about. The minute things kick off, the Squats are probably going to scatter, start throwing things, and its going to be manic. Just try to keep your wits about you. Keep your gun holstered, because you aint going to be able to hit these tiny fuckers anyway, and try not to run - if you tread on them, it's going to be a lot of paperwork."

Marcus was starting to wonder if a vacuum cleaner might have been a more suitable weapon than his sidearm, if his partner's description was to be believed. "Anything else I should know?"
14432.title: Bonsai/squat - size-reducing drugs
