14433.content: Designer drugs have come a long way in the last few years, and dealers are threatening to flood the city with synthetic drugs.
14433.title: Narcotics

144333.content:
Cocasian was a cheap and nasty alternative to cocaine trafficked to the USA from a number of South-East Asian countries. The region didn't have many coca trees, but it did have plenty of humans, and so criminal chemists had figured the ingenious plan of using CRISPR gene splicers to insert coca tree DNA into humans. The coca proteins would then be filtered from their blood, milk, urine or even faeces, and processed into something that almost resembled cocaine.

The quirk of the drug was that the gene splicers used to produce it remained active for a long time, constantly fragmenting the DNA of the poor hosts the cartels used to manufacture it, spitting out billions of little plasmids of random host DNA that were too costly to filter out of the final product. These plasmids would lodge in the cells of anybody taking cocasian, giving the user the appearance of the ethnicity of the host (or hosts) used to produce it - typically a mixture of South East Asian, though there were rumours of afrocaine on the market too.

Cocasian was everywhere now, mixed in with and tricky to differentiate from the real cocaine. The effects were starting to become noticeable, and could take weeks to wear off, and many businessmen, celebrities and politicians were scrambling to voice pride in Thai or Philippino roots that hadn't existed months before.

Politicians... When it started to affect them, that was when the pressure was really placed on the TFPD to stop the flow of the drug, or at least find a way to tell the real stuff from the fake.

1443332.content:

14433321.content:
It was a dark and stormy night. A good setting for a story opening, but far from ideal for a smuggling operation. The overladen boat sat low in the water, listing heavily as heavy waves battered against the side, threatening to capsize it. The crew on deck scrambled over the flooded deck to reinforce the ropes lashing the cargo down, knowing that the cartel's would have their heads if it was lost.

Another wave crashed against the rows of oil drums, cracking open the metal of one. The deck became illuminated by an eerie pink glow as neon-pink, neon-bright ooze began to gush from the rent in the drum. The seamen shrieked, leaping up to try to escape the pink now sloshing about their ankles. But for them it was too late. As the storm wore on, their desperate shouts became higher, more unfocused, and the brawny arms that were trying to save the ship became slimmer and weaker until finally the storm won out. The ropes broke, the barrels tumbled into the ocean, and the ship of sea(ex-)men was swallowed by a wave. The sea boiled a bright pink for miles around.

In the oceans depths, deep, melodious whalesong could be heard for anyone listening, becoming more sing-song as the night progressed.

On a brighter morning, a oil drum came to rest on a distant beach. On the side was stenciled the word: Bimbosys
14433321.title: Bimbosys

144333213.content:
The event became known as Bimbo Saturday. The beach forever became as “Bimbo Beach”.

Barrels of illegal Bimbosys drifted into the beach that morning leaking their toxic glowing pink liquid into the ocean.

Hundreds and hundreds of visitors were at the beach that day. Families and peoples of all ages just enjoying the hot summer day by the water.

Nobody noticed the water had taken on a slight pink shade due to the brightness of the sun that day. By the time anyone started to notice anything it was far too late...

Due to the dilution of the Bimbosys in the water levels of exposure varied. Those openly swimming in the water were rapidly transformed into busty mindless bimbos who didn’t even remember their own names.

Those touched or exposed to a small amount of the water were slowly transformed into bimbos and depending on their level of exposure had their minds affected in various ways.

Emergency crews were dispatched immediately once people started changing. The beach was quarantined and closed off as clean up crews did everything they could to stop the spread and help the infected.

Those heavily exposed were transported to a clinic up state where they would be cared for and treated. Hopefully in time some of the effects could be reversed. However there was no simple cure for anyone.

Those lucky enough to avoid contamination or were only changed enough to affect their bodies tried to return to their normal lives. However things for them were never the same.

Detective Jack Murphy is a member of the TFPD Narcotics Division. He was off duty visiting the beach that Saturday. He was there with his girlfriend Denise that day. He had actually planned to propose to her that very night.

Denise had gone for a swim when the commotion started. Jack was laying down drinking a beer when he saw people starting to collapse. They were writhing on the ground as men started sprouting breasts and women started to turn more and more sexual by the second.

Panicking he looked around for Denise trying to find her but the sounds of moaning were filling the beach so loudly as everyone was starting to turn into beach blonde bimbos.

By the time Jack could find Denise it was too late. She had already turned and was desperate to tear his clothes off right there. Jack managed to push her off and carry her to safety off the beach as he called in backup.

Jack however was not immune to the exposure himself. He soon found himself growing breasts as long blonde hair grew down his back....

—-30 Days Later—-

A month as passed since the Bimbo Beach incident. The situation is mostly under control now however there are still many unanswered questions. When the barrels of Bimbosys were retrieved, and the ship carrying the found capsized in the ocean. Nobody knew where the barrels came from. They were not on the ship’s manifest and crew had all been turned so they couldn’t provide any answers. How such a large supply of illegal feminization drugs made it on board and what the intended purpose of it was now the TFPD’s top priority.

—-Back at Detective Murphy’s—-

Jacqueline Murphy stepped out of the shower as she began drying off her long platinum blonde hair. Wiping the steam off the mirror she stared at her female body and let out a long sigh. She had been a woman now for 30 days and yet her reflection still felt like a strangers.

Jacqueline had a flawless bimbo body. She had two huge breasts that were perfectly rounded and perky, like a porn stars. She had a tight flat stomach with hourglass curves and a nice bubble butt. Long legs and cute feet with perfect arches to wear with heels. She had long platinum blonde hair down to her waist, perfectly tanned skin, and long nails that were painted a bright pink.

After her exposure Jack was changed into a bimbo like so many others but fortunately for him he was lucky enough to avoid any serious mental changes. He still felt many bimbo urges every day. Heightened sexual desires and the need to always dress sexy. However she managed to keep those in check...mostly

Denise had not been so lucky. She was upstate now at a facility with so many others undergoing treatment to try and reverse what had happened to her.

As Jacqueline got ready she slipped on a tight black mini skirt and white blouse that barely covered her massive tits. She was wearing a matching black thong and bra underneath along with black heels.

She strapped on her pistol and grabbed her badge as she finished up her hair and makeup. Today was her first day back at work since the change. She wasn’t sure what to expect but Jacqueline knew she had a job to do and wouldn’t rest until she found out who was responsible for all of this.

1443332131.content:
Jacqueline spent the day working through the tedium of reports and bland forensic papers. It helped her to get prospective on the case. Separating her personal feeling and trying to fully understand the scope of it. Manifest records spoke of a chemical shipment from a bogus manufacturer to a fake laboratory. Bimbosys not listed on the manifest. It led no where. It might help if the origin point wasn’t San Marcos a small Caribbean island. It didn’t recognize TFPD authority or any outside their own. Getting local help as likely as a snow tomorrow.

San Marcos a haven for illegal trafficking. Money the only authority that they recognized. The drugs might of originated there or any number of places. A small bribe to use their import stamp and you could say anything. Normally, customs looked over shipments carefully that arrived from there but it didn’t arrive in the traditional way. That told Jacqueline that this might have been a deliberate spill. To accomplish what? A test for a bigger target or to cause the uproar it did? Jacqueline twirled her hair as she thought. Another habit picked up with her body.

Switching gears she turned to the lab tests which didn’t help either. The substance degraded quickly once free from the containers. Rescuers tried to save victims and protect themselves not the transforming agent. A clean sample remained unavailable. Mostly theories and suppositions followed. They inferred from those affected that twin agents were involved. Physical and mental transformations were experienced by the transformees. The physical one needed less saturation to achieve desired parameters. Jacqueline agreed with that. She didn’t appear any different than those in direct prolonged exposure. Her mental state remained primarily intact due to her low dosage. The next portion frightened her.

It talked about secondary contact by the transformed. They found no antibodies in victims. They remained as susceptible. If not more so as they lay further along the scale toward a state of perpetual bimbodom. This didn’t deter her from continuing at the prospect of losing herself to a vapid existence. She’d continue into the lions den and beyond to bring these criminals to justice.

Jacqueline made a list of what she knew. There weren’t any dealers pedaling this on the street. No, bimbosys was new. The quantity large to be filling oil drums with it. No backyard manufacturer could manage that. Advanced development and probably time involved to create it. It took effort to produce a creation so thorough. Body and mind created to one purpose. This triggered an idea in Jacqueline.

Pulling up the search database in her computer she typed in keywords for type of transformation bimbo. That brought up the beach incident. She looked back ten years and found a case with a Dr Arnold Hulstead. His work altered a grad student of his into a simplistic bimbo. Reading further his reasoning that he wished to rediscover the atavistic nature in all humans. Connecting us to our primitive self. The gender change had been unintended. He thought that he could reverse it given time but got caught before allowed to continue. The method said chemical which definitely left bimbosys in play. The rest of the information pretty sparse. Putting a pin in this for further review. Jacqueline emailed Dr Yamato for his expertise. He might be able to eliminate it offhand if it didn’t amount to anything.

The report on the ship said that it sank due to weather conditions but that didn’t satisfy Jacqueline’s suspicious mind. She knew that all it took to upset a ship was an autopilot device planted to initiate the sinking and deleting conflicting data for the ships computers then a quick self destruct. No one the wiser. Autopilot devices at the basic level controlled data coming in and going out of a vehicle. Advanced models could seize control of the vehicle itself. She ran across various types when she did accident investigation. From the simplistic that told the car computer that you were always going to speed limit. To the elaborate where in one case an incendiary attached to it helped in the elimination of DNA evidence that would prove the body wasn’t the insured. A husband and wife team tried to fake the wife’s death for life insurance. Jacqueline’s pressure got the husband to crack. Accident or not she needed to find the manufacturer of the drugs.

Hitting the streets to talk to contacts would have to wait for tomorrow. Looking at the time she planned to drive out and visit Denise. She’d put it off long enough. Driving upstate to visit and check out the facility. There she might even get a better grasp on the chemical that effected her. She’d arrive after visiting hours but she found a badge got you in most anywhere at anytime. Jacqueline thought there would be a smaller chance of people thinking her a patient and thus an object of pity after hours.

On the drive her mind turned to her next steps. She could check with Chief Haywood about sending someone into San Marcos undercover. Checking to see if Dr Yamato responded to her inquiry. Sometimes it was best to go to him directly. He kept a busy schedule. Hitting the pavement to hear what her informants knew. She didn’t feel confident but at least she had leads to follow. The case wasn’t dead in the water.

Arriving at the large facility she felt trepidation. An old asylum repurposed and retrofitted with modern technologies but retaining that ominous appearance. A leering guard buzzed her in without asking for any ID only peering down her cleavage. Jacqueline’s heels clicking approaching the entrance. The number of cars in the parking lot surprised her for the late hour. Buzzed in at the door greeted by passionate cries and moans of patients in the throes of passion. This disturbed her but she remembered the state Denise was in when she last saw her, an attractive sexpot. You could hardly sedate them all the time but how could you work in such an environment?

14433321312.content:
Detective Murphy walked into the facility feeling a bit uneasy at the stares of the mostly all male orderlies that worked here. She was still armed and well trained but her new bimbo body was still reacting to their gazes in ways that made her uncomfortable.

Upon reaching the check in area a man she was familiar with. Dr. Harvey was standing next to a nurse giving her some instructions as he looked up and saw Jacqueline heading towards him.

“Detective Murphy...So glad you came to see us again. How can I help you?” He said twirling a pen in his hand as he held a clipboard.

“I’m here to see Denise. I want to see the progress she is making.” Jacqueline said trying to maintain the stiffness in her voice.

“I see...Well...now is not a good time. As part of their therapy those heavily affected by the bimbosys have given a new task. A job that helps them deal with their urges in a controlled environment.” Dr. Harvey explained

“That wouldn’t have anything to do with the cars out front? How busy does a mental health facility need to be at 10pm?” Jacqueline asked getting more suspicious.

“Please...We treat out patients with the absolute best care. It’s just this situation is...unique. It requires a different approach.” Dr. Harvey said as small heads of sweat began to form on his forehead.

Jacqueline knew they were hiding something. As she began to push harder on the subject she suddenly heard something....

“Is...is that music?” She said hearing a loud thumping noise down the hall.

“Detective! Without a warrant I must insist you return during visitation hours!” Dr. Harvey said running after Jacqueline who was now heading down a long hallway.

The music got louder and louder as Jacqueline pushed open a large door and froze at what she suddenly saw...

It was the gymnasium of the asylum. It had been changed and retrofitted into some kind of dance club...

There was a stage with bimbos on it stripping...Private booths and a bar.

“What the hell is going on here?” Jacqueline said looking around horrified. The bimbo patients here had been turned into strippers and exotic dancers.

“You don’t understand Detective! They begged us for this! We have tried everything with the patients but their desires couldn’t be ignored. It was getting dangerous to isolate them.” Dr Harvey said.

“You expect me to believe they wanted to be like this? To be your little sex toys that you sell out like property?” Jacqueline said with a hand on her gun.

“They didn’t want this life, but this is the best we can do for them now. They are starting to show progress this way. Many of them are starting to remember their old lives.” Dr. Harvey said.

The very idea of this made her sick. How could this be the best treatment for these people? On the other hand...If this was showing results who was she to stop it?

144333213123.content:
Before she could decide Jacqueline starting writhing in pain as the security guard fired his stun gun into her back, 300,000 volts shooting through her body as she screaming in pain just before she blacked out.

"Karl you idiot! Do you know what you've just done?" Dr Harvey screamed at the stunned security guard.

"She had a gun and I could see she was about to grab it!" Karl said trying to defend himself.

"Of course she does, shes a detective with the police department, didn't you check her in as she came through?" Dr Harvey questioned the security guard but knew the answer by the way Karl looked down at his feet. "This is very bad, not only will she see this new treatment get shut down immediately but we will also be out of job!" he screeched, "my career is completely ruined" he muttered to himself.

"I'm sorry Doctor, its past visitor hours so just expected she was one of the transfers we were getting this evening" Karl said to try and defend himself.

At that moment Dr Harvey suddenly realised that not all hope was lost. With Detective Murphy not being signed in and the security cameras disabled for the evenings experimental treatment nobody would know that Detective Murphy actually came to the facility this evening and with Karl reminding him of the transfers taking place this evening he could make this disappear.

Looking down at Jacqueline as she started to stir he looked back up at Karl. "As you said, we doing transfers this evening and since you never actually had her sign in as a visitor we can make your mistake disappear".

Karl was eager to fix this since this was the first job he has had in 3 years and didn't want to loose it for one little mistake and just stood back and watched Dr Harvey go over to the drugs cupboard, draw a thick clear liquid from a vial and inject the detective. "That should give us a few hours at least to prepare, take her to one of the empty rooms in the the locked ward and get her dressed like the rest ready for transfer, I'll get everything else sorted".

On that note Karl slung the unconscious Jacqueline over his shoulder and took her to get prepared as Dr Harvey opened the transfer records.
144333213123.title: Something else

1443332131231.content:
Jacqueline woke some time later with a pounding headache....Opening her eyes slowly she saw it was daylight as the sun peaked through the window of the room she was in. She felt something strange. A rocking motion as she slid around as she heard the splashes if what sounded like water outside.

Was she on a ship?

Standing up slowly Jacqueline saw her uniform and entire outfit was gone. She was wearing nothing but a loose fitting hospital gown now. Her ID, badge, and gun were all gone...

Looking out the window her fears did in fact come to light. Jacqueline saw the waves of the ocean out the window and also a land mass that was approaching in the distance.

The taser had blacked out the last memories Jacqueline had. She remembered being at the facility. She remembered talking to Dr. Harvey about something....then Black...

“What the hell is going on? Where am I?” She asked herself seeing that she was alone in a small cabin like room. She tried to open it only to find it was locked tight. There was however a small window hatch open in the front.

Footsteps outside her room made Jacqueline rush to the door. She saw a sailor sweeping the decks and mopping.

Jacqueline presses her fingers to her mouth and let out a loud whistle which got the sailors attention.

“Hey...Salior! Where are we? What I am doing here?” She asked.

The Salior was a young man maybe around 19 so when seeing Jacqueline wearing only a small gown he blushed a bit seeing her.

“I’m sorry ma’am...The captain said In not supposed to talk to you. However don’t you worry. We are off to bimbo island. It’s a wonderful vacation resort that’s been retrofitted for those of you affected by the Bimbosys incident. You are going to have all the fun in the world.” He said smiling before leaving.

Bimbo Island...This was bad.

Jacqueline had heard of the former vacation resort island that was now nicknamed “Bimbo Island.”

After the Bimbosys incident many of the infected needed places to stay but there wasn’t enough space in mental health facilities. A private resort company sold the rights to their vacation paradise island and now its being used to house dozens and dozens of bimbos.

Normally this wouldn’t brother Jacqueline until stories started to emerge that was resort was selling tickets to rich guys who wanted to visit an island inhabited by beautiful sexy women.

“Dr Harvey you Bastard...” Jacqueline said realizing why she was here.

She must have found out something bad and was knocked out and sent here as a way of keeping her silent. With her bimbo body it would hard for anyone to take her seriously.
1443332131231.title: Jacqueline wakes

14433321312312.content:
“Doesn’t the fact that I can hold an intelligible conversation tell you I don’t belong?” Jacqueline tried to appeal to the sailor’s reason.

“I could get thrown in the stockade if I keep talking to you.” The sailor said. “I am sure if a mistake was made they will figure it out at processing.”

“The navy has screwed up thus far you can imagine my worry that they will screw up again. I am an officer with TFPD. If you like I will recite my identification number. Dr Harvey is setting me up to get me out of the way. If you help me it will be a feather in your cap. You fail to do so it might mean a demotion. You know the navy they will look for a scapegoat when it plays out. For a moment do you think an officer will be blamed.” Jacqueline said hoping to play on the natural antipathy between sailor and officer. She pressed further checking his name tag, “Listen, Thorne you tell the officer about this, you’ll have it on record and they can’t put it on you. Say I am lying, really a total bimbo. Seems unlikely with my ability to use non monosyllabic words. But say I am, you only brought concerns to a higher up. Not something they should frown on.”

Thorne considered what she said. He said, “I am going to leave for a minute. Don’t go anywhere.”

“Where am I going to go?” Jacqueline said to the back of the nervous Thorne. She lay back in her cell hoping for the best. For interminable amount of time she waited till she heard activity outside her cell. Hearing the lock release and the door slide open a welcome sight. She sat up but didn’t stand to ensure she made no hostile gesture. Then she said, “What are you doing here?”

“Chief Haywood asked me to keep an eye on you. Her concern over your ability to perform continue despite the boards clearing you. I suspect she is concerned how you are doing under the strain but she didn’t say such.” The young man said.

“She wouldn’t. I’d question you calling her Chief Haywood over mother but I work with her. I am glad you are here.” Jacqueline said to Ray Haywood.

Ray responded, “I don’t think you needed me. You convinced that sailor to come talk to the officer on duty. Nice work.”

“I will consider it nice work when I have my gun shoved up Dr Harvey’s ass.” Jacqueline said her anger rising.

“We can stop on the way to the precinct unless you think we need backup. You can borrow my shotgun if that works for you.” Ray said.

Jacqueline smiled, “You know just what a lady likes. Let’s lockup some dirt bags.” Ray nodded in agreement. A set of pants and top shirt donated from the crew she left the ship. Throwing on a jacket from the car with the TFPD logo. The top few buttons undone on the shirt providing valley views. Ray drove the car as Jacqueline did a rundown of the case.

“You think Dr Harvey is involved with bimbosys?” Raymond asked.

Jacqueline considered it fro minute shaking her head, “As much as I’d like that, I gotta say no. His back round doesn’t indicate that. He is mostly an administer. Playing at treating the victims. It has laboratory capabilities but not to the extent of a full research station. It is a refurbished facility for patient management. Before this he was an assistant director at a psychiatric facility. His psychology degree doesn’t give him the know how for drug development.”

“The mastermind wouldn’t necessarily be the chemist.” Ray said.

“He didn’t strike me as a mastermind, more a bureaucrat. None of his records show anything exceptional.” Jacqueline said.

Ray took in the information and commented, “You know a lot about him and the facility.”

“My girlfriend is there.”

“Oh.” Ray said simply at the revelation. He didn’t want to press her.

“Don’t worry I am not upset.” Jacqueline said. Their conversation broke up with their arrival.

They detained Doctor Harvey and Karl Novak the security guard who helped him without incident. Resisting her urge to introduce her gun barrel to Dr Harvey’s colon. Jacqueline and Ray set themselves up for hours of homework. They reviewed tapes and files till they went cross eyed. Dedicated individuals eager to prove themselves. Ray that he was worthy of his position and responsibility. Jaqueline Murphy that she could still do the job.

Tapes confirmed their suspicions that Dr Harvey didn’t have anything to do with the bimbosys. He profited from it certainly but the plethora of easy to access information on his criminal activities. No criminal genius ever used password as their password. Jacqueline turned away seeing Denise giving herself freely to a man. Federal agents arrived in the morning to take care of any further arrests and manage the facility till patients could be transferred in their entirety. With a cup of coffee and a massage of her temples she decided to visit Denise.

Punching up the room on the viewport screen using a faux card. Faux cards could copy security cards when placed atop them. With Dr Harvey’s card she now had complete access. A perk of being TFPD, all the cool gadgets. Seeing Denise’s body distorted from the one Jacqueline loved. A caricature lay in her place fitted body hugging lingerie. Another swipe of her card and pressing unlock.

Denise’s mane of golden hair hung to the bed as she lifted her head. “Is it time for man fun?”

“No, do you remember Jack Murphy?” Jacqueline asked.

Denise dredged her limited mental capacities. Foggy images came to her of a man. Special somehow. A candlelit dinner across from him, a swim together, and a kiss under moonlight. “I liked kissing him. Is he here?” She asked excitedly.

Jacqueline didn’t think Denise could understand the nuance to the answer. She said, “No. You can go back to sleep. I just wanted to say hi.”

Smiling she waved saying, “Hi.” Then back to the sleep of the truly unburdened. Not even questioning the strange conversation.
14433321312312.title: Jacqueline tried to escape

144333213123122.content:

145331131.content:
"B..Bottom bitch..." you stutter, as you take in the changes to the car. But, the term is made clear as you feel yourself start to transform, and it's every bit as bad as you feared. Your uniform is eaten by the nanites, with supple, abundant female flesh visible beneath. The new clothes created to cover you are brief, tight, and ... easy access.

"I can't be a bottom bitch..." you object.

Your body strongly disagrees, as your body strains against the brief coverings.

"I'm sorry..." Griswold apologises. But that feels like a nightmare lie, as his face changes too. His clothes don't look right even once they've changed, covered in rips, tattered, untidy, and with a hairy, muscular chest barely hidden by a too thin T-shirt beneath.

"I'm sorry, but our disguise depends on us both playing our roles .. fully." His voice now a terrifying growl.

"You understand."

He cruelly grabs your long hair, and forces your head back and forth in a mockery of nodding agreement.

You don't feel any more comfortable as you drive deeper into Human district. You see curious eyes glancing jealously towards the beaten up car, as a prize. If they see you inside, they leer and stare until you're out of sight.

The nightmare intensifies, as Griswold turns to you, "Out!"

It's the worst neighbourhood, and a place you'd expect to see street walkers, and pimps. Griswold joins you on the sidewalk. An arm lazily, possessively around your waist. He pats the swell of your hip, "Don't worry, if anyone asks 'I'll tell them you're off the clock'. Okay, sweetie."

You wish you had more clothes on. Already titled a bottom-bitch by your partner, and with your body barely covered. You don't know whether to tug anything lower, higher, or try to make is stretch and cover more ground. Nervously, you fidget missing the arrival of the new figure in the door frame.

Your head snaps back up, from your fascinating cleavage when you catch her from the corner of your eye. She looks imposing, her face lights up as she sees Griswold.

She releases him, and takes a step back, her eyes roam over your body. Her gaze masculine, lingering on your curves. Also feminine in it's dispassion objectively assessing your beauty and appeal. You've never felt more like a piece of meat. You find yourself oddly jealous of her smothering coat, and how it hides her body... Just wishing you had something so snug, warm and comforting.

"What Gary won't have said, It's his place." she explains, "But, I run it for him."

"I'm Mary, and you... you'll be..." you sense her ready to christen you. Your mind whirls, as you struggle to give a name yourself. Only your own comes to mind... and that's really not suitable just now.

'Gary', guides you forward. A strong hand patting one large ass cheek. You're repelled by the touch, and propelled forward.

You squeeze past Mary, your first time in a brothel as a woman. The feeling is far more oppressive, turning for the comforting presence of 'Gary', you see him still outside.

You see Mary's head bob a 'yes' to him. Turning to you, her face is a fixed leer, that would 'unman' you... if you were still a man.

14533114.content:
You close your eyes against the searing light. A feeling of dizziness washes over you. Opening your eyes, you feel very different. Griswold has gotten taller.

"Where are we going?" your voice comes out soft and sweet. Instantly, you stop talking, your hand rising to your throat.

Belatedly, you realise it's you who've shrunk. Shrunk and changed gender.

"I'm introducing you to your new neighbourhood." He nods seriously. "From this point on I'm George Coats, from anthropomorphic services, and you're Sally Stephens."

You nod in agreement, filing away that nugget of information.

"Wait... anthro services... " you ask. The confusion clear in your tone.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/30/e4/54/...

"Yeah..." he confesses, "You're going undercover as a squirrel girl."

His hand reaches behind you, and you feel a wave of pleasure race through your body, as he strokes your tail. It surges in your mind, from oblivious to the centre of your being. Looking over your shoulder, you see it's bushy, dark red hairs bobbing around. The coppery hair framing your face also starts to make more sense now. It's a hell of a way to tell you that you're going undercover!

Shaking your head in disbelief. You can't believe you were blind to it's persence.

Your face must tell a picture of how pissed off you are at this revelation.

"Well, I thought you'd prefer that over pony girl... a smaller tail, but wider hips..."

You try to imagine it, but he's already moving his justification on.

"And I'm damned sure you wouldn't want to be a cow girl. A scrawny tail... but a very heavy chest, and the need to be milked."

Your hands rise to cover and protect your bust. Glad for it's more modest dimensions. A nervous glance beyond your bust. You take in hips that already look far too wide.

1453312.content:
Pulling into the slums it seemed like there was something going on. Some kind of mass protest it seemed. Barricades were set up at all major road intersections and other cops in riot gear were set up to block anyone from getting through.

“Oh what the hell. Of all days...” Griswold said getting out of car.

You were sure exactly what to do so you got out as well and followed him as Griswold went up to the Sergeant in charge of one of barricades.

“What the hell is going on here?” Griswold yelled as the deafening sounds of the protests made it hard to hear anything.

“Another Protest about containment! These things keep saying they want out, passports are too hard to get, blah blah blah, you know the usual shit.” The Sergeant replied.

“Well great...that’s just fucking great...” Griswold said in frustration.

“Sorry Rookie, we came on a bad day.” Griswold said looking to you.

“So what’s going on?” You asked.

“Oh every so often these things get together and protest their living conditions. They say it’s too hard to get a transport passport out of the slums, their living conditions are in humane, so forth and shit. I mean can you believe that? They got lizard people, centaurs, and men turned into bimbos out there and they call us in humane?” Griswold said spitting on the ground.

You weren’t exactly sure how to take this. It seemed like to you that these people regardless of their TF state deserved basic human rights. However as a cop you had an obligation to protect the general public. However didn’t that also include these slums?

This was a dangerous and volatile situation that seemed to be at a boiling point. All it could take was one small thing to set it off....

You took a few steps back back the organized chaos as you had no idea things were this bad right now. There had to be someway to regain the trust of the people again right?

You let out a deep sigh as you looked down as suddenly a large hairy palm suddenly emerged from the alley way behind you and dragged into the darkness before you could scream or grab your gun...
1453312.title: A problem inside the slums

14533121.content:
You could not move or scream as you were dragged off into a dark alleyway by a huge hulking force. A large furry hand covered your mouth and grabbed you kicking and struggling into the shadows of an alleyway as you heard a door opening as you were tossed in.

Several other people were there as you were quickly grabbed and tied up. A gag put over your mouth as they took your weapons away. You were now helpless and at the mercy of these strangers as you heard the door slam shut as the lights turned on.

You were in an abandoned garage of some kind it appeared as several people...or transformed people looked down upon you.

Of of them was a huge wolf man. Over 8 feet tall ripped with muscles and only wearing a tattered tank top and shorts. His dark brown fur smelled like an animal as his tail swished back and forth. He looked like a monster werewolf from a movie.

Next to him was kind of snake woman. Her lower half was a snake and just one long tail white her upper half was more human like but still covered in scales. You believe they called this a Naga.

Next to her there was a goat man hybrid. A Satyr you think there were called. He had the legs of a goat and horns and a hair body, but the body and face of a man.

Next was a human, a beautiful woman wearing a skin tight leather corset and mini skirt and boots. Her body was that of a porn star as she tossed back her long black hair to reveal her face which was half covered with a black mask.

“Hello there Officer. I see Griff got you to accept out little invitation.” The human said.

“We got him! Now what?” The werewolf Griff said in a deep and grizzly voice.

“How about sssss...some torture? I could give him sssssome of my venom?” The Naga said.

“No...we did this to send a message! Remember we are not like the rest of them!” The Satyr said in a wise sounding tone.

“You see Officer my friends and I have a problem. We were all transformed against our will. Various circumstances aside we found ourselves in these bodies permanently. However unlike the others who chose this lifestyle the government just tossed away in here like all the others. We can’t leave, we can’t see our families. To you we are monsters like everyone else. I myself was a 50 year account named Jeff two years ago.” The human woman said standing up with a sigh.

“I was grad student studying programming!” The werewolf Griff said.

“I was a house wide and mother of three!” The Naga said.

“I was an athlete, I was trying to be a pro basketball player!” The old satyr said.

“The point is we are all real people...with real lives. You cops and those assholes in power think of us all monsters. It doesn’t matter if we chose this life or not. Since there is no cure to permanent TF serums it’s easier to just lock us in here like everyone else. Your Transport Passport system is a joke. It takes years to even get considered for one.” The human woman said to you.

Kneeling down she slowly undid your mouth gag to let you speak.

“Listen...I’m sorry...None if what has happened to you is fair. However I’m just a rookie. It’s my first day. What do you expect me to do about it?” You replied.

You sympathized with them for sure, but this was the wrong way to go about change.

“We know...it was obvious you are new. That’s why we chose you. We have a little surprise for you. A permanent TF kind of surprise. Once the cops see their new star rookie is transformed we will see their attitude and true nature. Will they let you stay or just toss you in here with the rest of us. The only question is what kind of TF will make the greatest impact...” The human said said as she looked over several vials if colored liquid.
14533121.title: Several protesters have captured you

145331211.content:
“Let’s make him a monster like us! That will send the message!” The werewolf Griff said.

“Yesss...make a monster person or an animal!” The Naga lady said.

“No! We have to be reasonable. That will only make things worse!” The old Satyr man said.

“George is right. I’m sorry Sarah, Griff, I know your anger but we need to be reasonable. I think a simple human to human change is best.” The human woman said as she picked up a pink vial.

“So he gets to walk away with nothing? Just a simple change of skin color and hair?” Griff said angrily.

“Oh no...I’m thinking of something a little closer to home for myself. Tell me officer are you familiar with this?” She asked you holding up a glowing pink vial she loaded into a syringe.

“That’s...Feminol...how...did you get it?” You asked. Your time at the academy had you studying all sorts of the various TF drugs.

“Oh yes...who doesn’t remember good old Feminol? They were one of the first TF drugs on the market. Their whole idea was to let men become women for a time. Live our their wildest sexual fantasies then return to their life. Problem was...if you took even the slightest amount over the recommended dosage the changes became permanent...pretty soon men everywhere woke up to their new female bodies unable to go back. It didn’t take long for the mobs to start using it as a trafficking drug to make themselves sex slaves. Next thing you know Feminol is illegal and all known deposits are destroyed. Nowadays you have Feminmax. A way safer a easier to handle TF drug. No permanent risks and everything.” The human woman said.

You could see where this was going as you struggled against your bonds.

“I wasn’t so lucky you see. My wife and I wanted to spice things up one night. Do a little role play reversal. So I bought us some feminmax and Maculix to give us a spicy new night in the bedroom. Only problem is...my dealer gave me the wrong drug. He had some old school Feminol and got it mixed up. We did have a wild night my wife and I...problem is the next morning I woke up still looking like this...We tried everything. The Feminol changed everything down to my DNA there was no going back. She couldn’t stand looking at me anymore and next thing I know she’s reporting me to the TFPD and I’m getting tossed in here like an animal...” The woman said holding back her tears.

“Rachel please...” The Satyr named George said patting her on the back gently.

“Listen...I know your are angry but this won’t solve anything! Changing me won’t make me a martyr! It will only show the TFPD that you are beyond reason!” You said trying to break free.

“Oh...that’s where you are wrong...I’ve got a nice hyper dose of Feminol here. Enough to make you an incredible sexy woman forever...Use this to get those pigs at the top to listen to you. Maybe you can help us bridge the gap.” Rachel said preparing the drug.

“This was it! You were doomed!” You fighting your bonds when all of a sudden a bright light behind you appeared as the sounds of a swat squad could be heard.

“Release the officer! On your knees!” They called out as smoke bombs and tear gas canisters began to release.

“They found us! Run!” Griff called out as the group began to split as you heard the sounds of gun shots as you closed your eyes.

You tried to protect yourself from the ambush by covering your eyes and mouth but you still felt a searing pain in your leg like you were just stabbed.

It wall all over in a matter of minutes as you were dragged outside. Your fellow officers securing your safety as they swept the area.

Several minutes you opening your eyes and saw some EMTs around you.

“Don’t move...you’ve been hit.” One of them said looking to you with a serious tone.

“What I’ve been shot?” You asked nervously.

“No...worse.” Griswold said pointing to your leg as a syringe was sticking out of it, empty as the drug was now coursing through your veins...
145331211.title: A Human Change

1453312111.content:
"Am I... Am I becoming a woman?" you ask Griswold. His expression tightens, and he doesn't answer. You quickly recount the threats, and the innuendo of your captors.

He shakes his head, "Well, that's the best you can hope for..." He says shattering your hope.

Oddly, it's also reassuring. Griswold's bluntness was one of his characteristics that you liked. Plucking the syringe from your leg, he turned in his fingers. There was no marker, no logo, no label... nothing to tell you what was inside it.

"You'll be female certainly." he said.

Your frown, your confusion must've been obvious. But he nods towards the site of the injection. Already the flesh was visibly softer, a patch spreading out in an uneven circle. Your own hairy flesh being overrun by the relentless advance of the nanites.

"Female." you take the word, trying to hold onto its solidity. You want to know as much as possible about your future. The uncertainty is worse than the injection.

Already, you could see the difference between your legs. One familiar, the other now softer, a smoothing layer of fat giving it a femininity. You can only hope that it will stop at that point. You try not to panic... wondering if fearing this makes you sexist. You don't feel like a sexist... But, would you know?

You try not to think about how you'll look as a woman. A surge of panic, of emotions, of hormones can make the change more extreme.

You don't want to alarm yourself into a worse situation. The image of you becoming too horny, too stupid, too curvaceous to keep working niggle at your calm. You want to keep your life as similiar, as familiar as you can.

"At least I still have legs..." you say, with a weak smile. You can rule out becoming a naga.

1511.content:
[Chapter originally by Cana]

Greed made fools of men as it had with Gregor Kozlov. He never should of sold his creation to that low life drug dealer Marcus. His carelessness with the experiment BX 15 led to the Tfpd getting a hold of it. Bx 15 a genetic mix of bull and man produced a creature similar to the mythical minotaur. Now they might be investigating him. He needed the money though to get a better genetic synthesizer. He knew dwelling on the mistakes of the past would not help him now.

Might be time to contact officer Charles Olson and see what else he knows. Olson let him know they held BX 15 in their cells. Wetting Gregor's desire to know more but knowing Olson would only get more information for a price. A quick scan by a dna lock opened the door to his private work shop. He made his way past the various experiments fermenting in varied states of completion to his private office. He slid a wooden panel on the wall open and keyed in a code to a wall safe. With the safe open he grabbed a handful of money to use to ply openness from Olson. He put the money in his pocket. An inconvenient phone call later he set a meeting with Olson. Retrieving BX 15 would be ideal but he didn't imagine the tfpd officers letting him walk it out. Olson might be able to alert when they decided to transport and he could hit them. He did not need this. His work would advance humanity beyond its fragile form.

Gregor nodded to Olson acknowledging him. He turned on an electronic scrambler. The device prevented any recording or video from being used. The park that they met at offered multiple escape options. Olson looked around for any observers before going into a men’s room with an out of order sign he put on it. Gregor nervously looked about before rushing in.

Olson waited for the twitchy Gregor to enter. His smile displaying his eagerness for the pay off. He asked, “What do you want know? I am an open book after a mutual understanding is arrived at.” The scientist tossed a pile of money on a sink disinterested in haggling.

Gregor sneered saying, “I need to know all that is known about the BX 15. Am I suspected? And all details about the transportation of it like when and where. Is there any way that you could sneak it out of the station. I can provide you with a genetic deconstructor if you can get close enough to it. It is a liability I need to either reclaim or properly disposed of.”

Olson thought about the profit and risk. Alerting Gregor of the transportation information on his pet wouldn’t be difficult. On the other hand eliminating the creature himself would be lucrative but risky to carry out in the station. He finally decides…
1511.title: You're a criminal hunted by the TFPD

choices: Take a moment to admire your new tree
1512.content:
It is two weeks before Christmas. All through the town a heavy snow is falling through the 2am darkness, filling the streets of the city with deep drifts and summoning the plows and salt spreading trucks out into the night. With a spray of grit bouncing off your windshield, you hitch a lift in the wake of one of them, the three bald tyres of your dad's Reliant Regal Van slipping back and forth across both lanes.

The weather is a nuisance. On the positive, the streets are clear, the drunkards have had the good sense to stagger home hours ago and even the homeless have found somewhere else to sleep for the night. Good. No witnesses.

You take a left into the town square. With a hard thud the front tyre hits a buried curb, bouncing the car on to the plaza that sits in front of the city hall. Concrete bollards guard the perimeter. You hit the brakes and skid to a halt a few meters from the ten-feet tall glass doors of the front entrance, rocking gently on the front axle. The engine is purposefully left running. There's no guarantee that it will start again, particularly in cold like this, and you like your getaway vehicle to be able to actually get away.

The city hall looks grand in the snow and the spotlights, festooned in red and gold decorations and twinkling with fairy lights. The entrance hall is particularly fine. It had been decorated by the children of the local primary school earlier that day. Crayoned pictures of Santa Claus and reindeer hang beside the old oil paintings of dead mayors.

A 8-foot tall Christmas tree stands in the center of the hall. Its thick foliage sags under the weight of gingerbread and candy canes and multicolored shiny baubles upon its branches, and it has been practically lashed to the wall with tinsel. Under its bows sit four red velvet sacks bulging with gaudily wrapped presents, toys donated by charitable souls to be distributed on Christmas eve to the needy orphans of the city. So they think anyway.

You flash the headlights once...

Within the entrance hall, nothing moves. Please tell me the old man hasn't fallen asleep during a heist again.

Nervously you wait, one ear pricked out as always for the wail of sirens. After a few minutes, a security guards sidles into view and you shrink down behind the dashboard. He strolls across the entrance hall with a slow, bow-legged plod, mouth pursed in a whistle, twirling a torch by its strap around his fingers. He steps up to the tree, admires its festive grandeur and leans forward to smell the rich pine scent on its needles. His brow furrow as he notices the surprisingly large number of Alpine Fresh Car Fresheners hidden among the baubles, just barely concealing an underlying air of stale cigarette smoke.

Swallowing hard, you give one blast on the car horn. The security guards stands sharply to attention, spinning around to inspect the vehicular intruder upon the plaza outside. The tree shifts, a wooden branch very much like an arm raising itself out of the foliage behind him.

"Fairy-lights out, buddy," a gravely voice whispers in his ear as the branch thuds down on his head. The guard crumples to the floor.

You fling open the car door and jump out. The freezing night air cuts right through your thin clothes as you race to the door. The Christmas tree rocks back and forth in its tub. Its thick trunk split vertically as it lifts a pair of leg-shaped roots from the soil into which it has been planted. Mud pours off its gnarled feet. It takes a few awkward steps, tearing itself free from the tinsel and lights that bind it. With baubles falling from it and shattering against the floor, it stoops to pilfer a bunch of keys from the guard's belt before grabbing a sack in each hand.

I hope they have CCTV, you laugh as the tree lumbers to the door. We're going to be in all the newspapers. This is going to be the heist of the century. We'll be famous. Well... infamous.

The tree crows through the door. "You should have heard me, son! I said 'fairy-lights out' and then I hit him over the head! Like 'lights out' but with a Christmas spin to it!"

"Now's not the time for dumb jokes, dad, get the door open!"

The tree fumbles with the keys. "Alright, alright, one moment, here we are." Next moment it is flinging the doors open and racing towards the van, throwing the haul into the back and itself into the passenger seat. You lug the third sack back to the van and dive into the passenger seat, skidding away from the crime scene in a flurry of snow.

It's cramped in the cabin, squashed as you are between a Santa's sack of stolen goods and an 8-foot tall tree guffawing to itself. "The perfect crime, boy, the perfect crime! Now those stupid kids will get exactly what I always got for Christmas - nothing!" The tree pats itself down before withdrawing from some unknown crevice a crumples packet of cigarettes. It maneuvers one of them into a gap in its needles that must be its mouth. "That machine is everything I dreamed it could be. It all went off without a hitch - well, other than the fact that they wouldn't stop watering me, my feet are soaked through. Get that heating on before my toes freeze off."

Your eyes are focused on the road ahead but you look over as he lights up. "I don't think you should be smoking in that costume, dad"

"Ehh? Cause I'm a tree?"

"No, cause its made out of rubber or something. It's probably flammable!"

He ignores you to take a deep drag on the cigarette, glowing embers tumbling down the suit. After enough self-satisfied puffs to fill the cabin with smoke, it said, "Yep, things are going to really turn around for us now, Nick. You and I, we're gonna be rich. With this baby, we'll be able to go anywhere, steal anything, and there's nothing the police can do to stop us. I mean what are they gonna do, check every tree in the city? I don't think so!" Now Harry worked ostensibly as a consultant for one of his businesses but really he continued his work. Any findings Harry would have that could be sold legally one his other employees “discover” in by legal means. Making Joesph much wealthier. Harry didn’t care about credit only the ability to continue his work. That suited Wallis just fine. He supplied the equipment and chemicals necessary.

Harry worried about upsetting Joey with disappointing results. He was grateful for the help with his legal trouble. Then the further obligation of giving him a job and allowing him to work again. He timidly said, “I don’t know how well the programming will would work. There is a twenty percent chance it might fry his mind. I have improved the transmutagen survivability by at least four percent.” He looked up at Joey hoping he wouldn’t be disappointed.

Joseph nodded without turning his, “That is fine. I still want to go forward with the programming. Twenty percent is better odds than I get in Vegas.”

Harry sighed in relief as he pressed a few buttons on his remote to lower the programming helmet onto the subject. He already saw the subjects figure diminishing. Unfortunately, the attempt to turn the subject had ended up putting to much stress on the subjects system and it passed away. The autopsy results came up as a stroke.

With time he hoped to come up with more consistent results. The sweat poured down the subject as the final shifts continued. He wanted to know if the bargain he got for them would be a score. Harry might be able to make sense of them. Russsell ‘the fox’ Leeds acted as his go between with Olson. Making the drugs is easy. They literally grow on trees (as God intended) and you, Felix Gacha, employ literal armies of workers to pick and process the valuable leaves into the final product.

Laundering the money was simply enough too - entire Latin American nations exist (you've financed their creation yourself) to clean up your profit and deliver it back to you by the truckload. The literal truckload. Every day, more pallets of cash are unloaded at your compound to the point where there is no longer any space to store it. You've had to resort to burying millions of $$$ out in the jungle like a goddamn pirate! Every year, you lose 10% to rats.

No, the hard part is getting your product over the borders into the really lucrative markets, the USA and Europe. It is a game, a tug-of-war between you and your "men", and the DEA, Europol, the TFPD, as both sides try to outwit one another. It's a game that you're very much winning.

Sure, every now and then they bust a billion dollar shipment or catch a few of your drug mules, but the billions in cash are almost as expendable as the mules. For every billion they find, a dozen more slip through the fingers.

Typically, you've always been in the cocaine trade but times are changing. With the advent of transgenic plants, it's now possible to tailor the crops to produce any almost compound, and while cocaine remains the big money maker, you know you're going to have to diversify or die, literally. Designer rugs, synthetic hormones, bespoke psychotropics, they're all emerging markets that you're keen to get into - to which end you've kidnapped the bioresearch faculties of several universities to work for you.

The logistics of drug trafficking are always changing, as you try to one-up the drug trackers. You've tried everything with cocaine - baking it into cakes, hiding it in soap, religious statues, plaster casts, dissolving it in bottles of pepsi. But your preferred method of choice is women.

Women made the best drug-mules. Their bodies were natural containers after all. The beautiful creatures would swallow thousands of dollars of your packaged product and hold it in their intestines while they crossed the border, to be decanted on the other side. They were naturally accustomed to having their vaginas and anuses packed to the brim, into which you gleefully inserted liters of product. Drug enforcement officials were less likely to search them than men, less likely to use deadly force, and women had their own ways of "persuading" border guards to look the other way.

A simple x-ray would detect swallowed product, of course, but there were ways around that. Breast and ass augmentation was common in this part of the way, and no border guard would look twice at a woman sporting a juicy pair of fake tits. Well, they certainly might look twice, but they're unlikely to suspect that, instead of silicone, your surgeons have filled those implants with pure diluted cocaine. Each enhanced tit can hold within it between 100 and 500ml of the stuff. Surgeons on the other side remove the implant, drain the fluid, and easily filter out the product. You have more product than you can pump into your limited supply of female mules, already packaged up in millions of jiggly implants just ready to be inserted, but you have more men lining up to be mules than you know what to do with.
