One night James was on his way home walking late at night as the busses had already gone away for the night. It was almost 2am as James yawned and walked down the sidewalk trying his best to keep to himself. This neighborhood wasn’t the best part of town.

As James made his way home he suddenly heard something. It was the sound of a struggle it sounded like. Following the noise Jimmy went into an alley way as he smelt sea water as he knew he was getting closer to the pier. Peaking around the corner he saw something.

James saw what looked like a limo. Two large guys in track suits were getting out the front while a slick looking overweight guy in a dark suit got out of the back. He was smoking a cigar as his two henchmen went into the trunk and opened it up.

Out of the trunk one of the henchmen grabbed what James could tell was a woman. She was beautiful, Latina it seemed, brown skin and long slick black hair. She was currently wearing a sexy black cocktail dress but was barefoot as her shoes had been removed. She was also bound and gagged it seemed as the large henchmen grabbed her and tossed her over his shoulder.

James new he shouldn’t get involved in this...He knew he should just call the cops. However his heart wouldn’t let him. He knew the cops would never arrive in time. Not in this city. This lady was in danger and it was up to him to do something about it.

James followed the henchmen and their boss as they went into an old warehouse by the pier. James saw they had left the door open so he very slowly snuck behind them as he peaked around the corner.

What he saw was a scene right out of a mafia movie. The woman was tied to a chair as the henchmen and their boss circled her.

“Maria...oh...Maria...You are breaking my heart right now do you know that?” The boss said as stroked her cheek with his hand that was covered in gold rings.

“Boys...Maria here was the best girl I had ever seen in this business. Beautiful, smart, and strong. I had such high hopes for you...however you know what they say...if something is too good to be true...it probably is...” The boss said reaching into his coat as he tossed what looked like a badge on the ground.

“Detective Maria Espinoza, TFPD. I’m honestly shocked. Your profile online looks nothing like you now. They must have really given you a touch of the good stuff to make you look this sexy now!” The boss said with a laugh as his goons joined in.

The boss took off Maria’s mouth gag as she stared at him with a cold look.

“I was never one of your best girls Mick...I was sent in to take you down. Your operation is well known in the TFPD. You smuggle in illegal Bimbosys and use it to turn innocent people in sex crazy bimbos then you bring them into your private harem that rich sickos can pay for.” She said spitting at him.

“Please...Transformation drugs aren’t all over the place. People always want to be something they can’t. I just provide the means for those to find the comfort they desire and fulfill their fantasies.” The boss said with an arrogant tone.

“Do what you will to me but know that if you kill me your days are over...The TFPD will bring you down.” Maria said.

“Kill you? Please...That would be such a waste...I think there is a better use for you.” The boss said snapping his fingers.

James saw perched above the detective was one of the henchman pushing a large barrel towards the edge right above her. Taking off the lid a strange bubbling pink liquid was inside.

“I think a Bimbosys shower will turn you into exactly the kind of girl who will become my personal private Harem girl for the next few years.” The boss said with a laugh.

“You sick bastard! You won’t get away with this!” Maria said struggling to get out of her bonds. It seemed she had something hidden away in her dress but couldn’t quite reach it...

“I’m going to miss our little chats....” The boss said as he snapped his fingers again as his henchmen began to tip the barrel over causing the pink liquid to start pouring out right above Maria.

Maybe it fate...maybe just dumb luck...Whatever it was that made James jump out from his safe hiding spot and propel him forward, nobody knows. James had kept from hiding right before the liquid was to splash all over Detective Maria as he pushed her out of the way but causing himself to be soaked instead...

Everyone in the room was shocked at what had just happened. However Maria wasted no time as the push had freed her from her binds enough to reach into her dress and pull out a hidden gun as the boss and his goons began to flee.

“Your choice cop! You can either get us or save the kid...” The boss said fleeing with his goons.

Maria wanted nothing more than to stop these jerks but she looked over to the young man who had just saved her.

James was writhing on the ground covered in a pink liquid. His body was beginning to twist and turn as his flesh and body were starting to change...

“What’s...happening to me?” James cried out as his voice was getting higher.

“Damn the bimbofication has already started...You need help now.” She said as she used the hidden radio in her dress to call for help.
1551.title: Sounds good

15512.content:
James’s mind reeling thinking horrible thoughts calling out, “Help me!” In an elevating voice. Maria slipping out a system stabilizer tube. Short metallic and looking like an insulin injector when with the top flicked off and needle exposed. A last resort use when an agent found themselves subject of an unknown substance. Its chilling force ran the course of the young man’s veins. Trembling with his internal systems freezing. A crystalline coating developing on top of Jame’s skin entering him into a coma like state.

Maria mind racing trying to figure out her next move. Sirens sounding in the distance sent a wave of relief. Groping at James’s back pocket retrieving his wallet calling in, “I have one James Erickson. A twenty one year male exposed to bimbosys. I administered system stabilizer. Vocalization changes noticeable. No further physical or mental alterations observed. Immediate medical evac recommended. Hazmat team needed to clean up any chemical residue.”

A confirmation on the other side of the radio came immediately. They alerted her that all possible assistance would be forth coming. Emergency vehicles pulling up bringing aid. Maria directed a couple police vehicles to give chase to the escaped criminals. Unlikely they would catch up but the chance always lay there. An ambulance arrived to take James off to whatever help might be possible.

Maria did a run down with the chief upon her arrival on scene hearing the incident on the radio. Directing Maria to head home after and come in early for further questions after a nights rest. She went home to decompress but found it took a few beers to settle herself. Anger for getting caught and an innocent victim laying in a hospital room left to an unknown fate. Flicking on her computer reviewing what the database knew on bimbosys. Scrolling down to treatment it didn’t appear promising. No known cure sent her stomach into a tumult. Perhaps a phone call to her contacts for help.

Dr Yamato eyed the charts with fascination. The transmutation factor on the chemical significant. Sadly it dissipated quickly. Human systems absorbing it rapidly. Only traces for analyse, degraded to a point only cursory exam could be done. Nothing to explain its origins. He only did a perfunctory read on the patient back round uninterested in the human aspect unless it relates to the physical condition. Noting his address to do a follow up sans scrutiny if necessary.

The doctors flushed out James’s system the stabilizer staving off drastic shifts in his body. Tragically ruining any opportunity to retrieve an untainted sample. Damaging what sample they might obtain within. What brought Dr Yamato was transplantation. The young man found himself subject of the surgical precision of the talented doctor for replacing his vocal cords. That he might not fall to ridicule. A phone call from Espinosa brought him in. Providence smiling on him he thought with a laugh. With a cool attitude he handled procedure with the ease his talent made it. Palming the extracted material for personal testing and examination into a preservative container. A risk but definitely worth it.

James woke with a with a shivering chill. “Easy there Mr Erikson. Your system has undergone quite a shock. Lay back and see if you can talk.” A kindly young nurse said adjusting IV.

James took a minute to examine himself for any feminine signs. No bulbous protrusions issuing an audible sigh of relief, feeling his manhood in place. The nurse snickering said, “Find what you were looking for?”

A warm feeling hit his cheeks, “Sorry, I uhh…”

“No worries I understand. The Doctor will be in shortly.”

“So I am hundred percent okay?” James said confused at the his unusually deep voice. It might be hoarse he thought.

“The doctor will talk it all through with you.” She said stepping back as an austere doctor entered the room in a tailored suit topped with a lab coat and stethoscope.

“Hello, I am Doctor Kellar. How are you feeling?”

“My voice sounds funny.”

“Yes, tonal changes are to be expected. Necessarily we needed to remove effected tissues. Don’t worry the eminent Dr Yamato performed the procedure. A chemical agent of unknown nature attacked you systems. We removed it the best we could from your body. A device attached to your cerebral cortex will monitor and filter out any foreign elements. The hope is that nothing remains but if there is the device should help.” Dr Kellar said.

“Should help? What if it malfunctions? What if there is some bimbosys in me?”

“The cybernetics inside you should detect the anomaly, alter us and quarantine it. I am sorry that I can give you no guarantees. You are receiving the best care we can provide.” Said Dr Kellar.

Dr Yamato sent the tissue samples through a sequencer to try and develop a pattern for what transmuting secrets they contained. Questions ran through his head. Why did it only interact with humans? How could it enact such a thorough alteration mental and physical? How could chemical contain such a sequence? Possibly microrobotics or a multi-layer meshing agent with a base DNA sequence interlinked. If he could master its complexities it would take his work to the next level.

Maria came in the next day to compare notes with Jackie both a victim and fellow detective for the TFPD. Jacqueline formerly Jack a victim of bimbosys chemical became lead detective investigating the drug. Maria said, “I am still not sure how my cover got blown.”

“Be glad that you aren’t stuck with a couple zeppelins like me.” Jackie said her tight shirt with generous cleavage on display. “Or worse being a slutty simpleton.”

Maria checked her chest saying, “I am. But I was so close to nailing the asshole.”

“We have a description thanks to you.” Jackie said.

“He has the money and connections to alter his appearance. It won’t be good for long.” Maria said frustrated.

“Then we shake down every appearance changers we know. It is something to go on. Better than spinning our wheels here.” Jackie said and Maria agreed.
15512.title: Later at the hospital

choices: Jamie recounts her last two weeks
Maria realizes Jamie can help her
155123.content:
Dr. Yamato gave him the full run down the day he woke up. His DNA had been permanently altered by the high levels of Bimbosys he had been exposed to. If Detective Maria hadn’t intervened James would have been just a mindless dumb bimbo right now.

Luckily the cybernetic implants and medications were keeping the changes at bay for now but unfortunately Dr. Yamato had to break some seriously bad news to James. These preventive measures were only temporary. Eventually his body and immune system would reject them causing his body to start turning back into a bimbo form again.

This news hit James like a ton of bricks. It was like being told you were dying, but in a different way. The only good news out of this situation was the cybernetics in his brain should be able to hold back the worst of the mental changes. He would still be himself, however certain bimbo urges and desires would inevitably get through.

The TFPD took James’ statement and even the Chief herself Olivia Haywood dropped by James’ room to offer her gratitude and appreciation for what James did. His heroic sacrifice saves the life of one her best detectives. James was to receive a public honor and medal and be featured in the news.

James thanked the Chief but declined her offer. The reality of his life ahead of him was too much for him to deal with right now and the last thing he wanted was the public to see him like this.

The Chief understood. She left with the simple process that the TFPD would make sure he was taken care of during this transition period and she gave her word they would never rest until Mickey, the crime boss responsible for this mess was brought to justice.

——Two Weeks Later—-

Detective Maria and her partner Jackie had now hit a dead end in their investigation. With their covers both blown no one was willing to talk to them. Mickey had either skipped town or gotten his appearance altered again.

None of his known clubs or cover businesses showed any sign of him. Stakeouts proved useless and just left them Tired.

None of this seems to stop the business however. Two more young girls had gone missing in the last couple weeks. Reports that the secret harem was still up and running began to come in through the confidential informants they still had left.

Maria sat alone one afternoon drinking a cup of coffee as she poured over paperwork. She felt both a mixture of anger and guilt over the situation she was in. Somewhere she messed up and in the process ruined her investigation and the life of that poor guy who saved her.

Maria too had sacrificed much for this investigation. Before this assignment she looked much different from before. She was a skinny and undeveloped paper pusher for the TFPD. She always had the brains but never the body to go out into field work.

However when the Chief and Dr. Yamato offered her this chance she couldn’t refuse it. Her treatments gave her this amazing body. Large breasts, great curves, and a seductive personality and desires. However it came at a large personal cost. The transformation was irreversible and permanently left Maria with seductive desires she could never Fully shake.

How she got exposed still bothered her to no end. It had taken months to establish her trust with Mickey. The things she had to do still haunted her to this day which was why a bottle of Tequila was always near her desk or home now. The only answer she could come up with was an insider tipped Mikey off.

A couple days passed as Maria decided to drop in on James and see how he was doing. She hadn’t been told about his condition only that he had been released. Maria still felt an enormous amount of guilt over what happened and wanted to check up on him.

Maria dropped by his apartment and knocked on the door which slowly opened as Maria’s eyes went wide.

Standing in the doorway was a beautiful busty blonde woman. She had long platinum blonde hair that fell down to her waist. She had huge perfectly rounded breasts that stuck out from her chest with no sag. She had wide hips and a perfect bubble butt along with long well toned legs.

She looked like the kind of perfect porn star or trophy wife one would see on a reality show. Her body looked sculpted by design to be sexy in almost every way. Down to her pouty full lips and long eyelashes. To her long perfectly trimmed nails. And even the sultry sound of her voice.

She was wearing a tight tank top that barely covered her large tits and exposed her midriff along with a black mini skirt that barely went to her thighs.

She looked at Maria confused for a second. “Detective Espinoza?” She asked a bit confused.

Maria was equally confused. She had no idea who this girl was. “Yes...I’m looking for James, he around?” She asked.

The girl looked a bit sad for a moment as she looked up.

“Not anymore...You can call me Jamie.” She said forcing a weak smile on her face as Maria realized what had happened...
155123.title: James deals with developments

1551232.content:
Maria thought about the figure of the woman before her. She would certainly draw stares and just the attention that could bring in Mickey. She could use her as an undercover agent. No way her boss would go for it. But she didn’t need to know. “Say Jamie would you like to get back at the man who did this to you?”

“Like I don’t know it has been lots of fun. I totally got three numbers last night and company to take home with me.” Jamie said with a smile on her face thinking on it.

That wasn’t the response she was looking for. “But think of all the competition that he will create so you won’t have anyone to go home with.”

Jamie’s simplified mind found the logic in Maria’s words, “You are sooo right. I am in what do I need to do?”

“Don’t worry I will walk you through it.” Maria said, “I will even get you a cute outfit.”

“You are the best. I am going to to give you a super squeezy hug.” Jamie said proceeding to embracing Maria tightly. Maria rolled her eyes planning out her next steps.

Getting a fitted outfit with seamlessly in stalled listening device and and optical viewing took a raid on the disguise wardrobe. Jenkins who ran it did so as if he was already retired. Normally no nod to your existence took place upon entering. Often engrossed in his TV to login a person’s arrival. This led to multiple opportunities to borrow for closet expansion and covert activities. Maria took a dress that allowed for Jamie’s buxom attributes. Low cut and tight the better to attract attention. Maria wondered how to best lure in Mickey without Jamie simply being picked up by a man on the make. Walking over she began to choose out jewelry. A set of dangling earrings that she could use to call Jamie off any man she thought might be innocent.

On to heels she went. Hunting through them till Maria found the black strapless ones she sought. The snap offs that contained chemicals inside that sprayed knockout gas to anyone in range. An inoculation for Jamie to protect her from the effects. She arranged to meet at Jamie’s apartment. Walking her through the various items and gadgets but especially the heels. Maria could handle the surveillance portion of it. Ignoring the fawning over the dress Maria got an eye full of Jamie’s naked curves hug the dress as she filled it out. Nipples on full display with Jamie foregoing a bra and panties. She didn’t like the lines that would make in dress. Then bait was hooked for Mickey.

Maria drove the surveillance van with Jamie chatting how exciting it all was. She tuned her out on the drive to one of Mickey’s favorite bars. His appearance altered she hoped he’d show up there. “Good luck Jamie.”

“Thanks but with my new body I get lucky all the time.” Jamie said. Sauntering into the seedy bar she positioning herself at the end of the bar like Maria told her to. Surveying the bar for yummy men.

Maria observed through a lens positioned on Jamie’s shoulder. A few women plying their trade and more than a few seedier individuals that she began running through facial recognition software. Recording on tape every tattoo and distinguishing feature. A fat slovenly fellow walked up asking her price. Maria told her to tell she wasn’t for sale. She couldn’t imagine Mickey choosing an unattractive body. Jamie followed instruction but this didn’t go over well.

“You can’t come in here looking like that saying you aren’t selling. Oh you are for sale or I am taking you for free.” The man said angrily. No hero types moved to her aid till a well attired man stepped out of the back room.

In an even tone he said, “You need better manners. Leave before this becomes physical.”

The fat man lowered his head, “Do I have to go?” His bluster lost and a defeated look on his face.
A faux smile came across the silk suit man that never touched his eyes. His eyes spoke of menace. “I don’t think that is necessary. You sound contrite enough. Apologize and go back to your table.” The fat man slunk away in shame. Maria smiled thinking she must of found her mark.

The slick man with a smooth smile sat beside Jamie, “I am Wesley Thornton. May I be so bold to inquire who you are?”

Maria whispered go for it. Jamie grinned to the handsome new man, “I am Jamie and I am looking for company tonight.” This certainly caught Wesley’s attention.

“Might I inquire as to what the requirements are to accompany you tonight?” Wesley said.

Jamie’s eyes drifted down to his groin smiling at the bulge, “Why don’t we step outside where it is quieter?” Wesley took the offer and followed her feminine form out the door up to the van. Where after locking lips Jamie did an exhaustive search for weapons. Finding the usual one between his legs. Checking to see if it was loaded she discovered it to be an adjustable barrel lengthening in her hands. Jamie only triggered her heel under duress from Maria’s repeated pleas.
1551232.title: Maria realizes Jamie can help her

info.brief_description: Transformation in a dark world of vice, violence, and villainry.
info.description:
The TFPD deals with unusual and bizarre cases in all fields of criminal investigation, from situations of identity theft through to assault and murder, drug smuggling and people trafficking, and high tech robbery. Though only a small organization of exceptional officers and operatives, its jurisdiction and budget is extensive, and it has access to the bleeding-edge of top-secret military hardware.

Guidelines

1. Transformation can be fun, though the general tone is intended to be fairly dark. Transformations may be slow, painful experiences, prone to going horrifically awry, leaving users disfigured or dead. Officers may suffer all sorts of long-lasting physical and mental trauma, be killed or worse in the line of duty.

2. Feel free to include magic or supernatural elements. Shows like X-Files or Fringe are good inspiration.

3. As a small force, the TFPD tends to work alongside regular law enforcement as "specialists" for unusual cases.

4. The TFPD is departmentalized - as such members of one department may know little about the work of the other departments. Some departments are more mundane than others, and so a member of Drug Enforcement may have zero knowledge and even contempt for the officers in Animal Control, unaware of the highly dangerous "monster hunts" the latter frequently go on, or even that such legendary beasts exist.

5. Roughly half of the TFPD's manpower works in witness protection. The TFPD now handles all of the country's witness protection programs, providing witnesses with new identities up to and during their day in court, in many cases for the rest of their lives.

6. TFPD officers are not incorruptible, and there will always be cases where information leaks into the wrong hands for the right amount of money. Due to the many ongoing deep-cover missions being undertaken by its officers, as well as its witness protection programs, any information leaks are taken very seriously. Nor are officers above using the department's resources for their own personal ends.

TFPD Staff

Chief Olivia Haywood - the head honcho of the TFPD, Mrs Haywood is a serious, sober official with a distinguished history in both the military and the police force. Commited to doing things "by the book", her stern demeanor and strong sense of civic duty is often the only thing stopping the anarchic department from descending into chaos. She is in her mid-forties but despite many years behind a desk, she keeps herself in peak physical condition.

Doctor Yamato - the world's finest plastic surgeon, Yamato rose to fame after performing the first Species Reassignment Surgery, where he successfully transitioned a dog into a cat. His work is groundbreaking but controversial. It was during an investigation into his sourcing of certain "transplants" from third world countries that he agreed to work alongside the TFPD as a freelance specialist, in exchange for sweeping his many legal indiscretions under the rug. He provides his remarkable services on an irregular basis, though due to frequent trips to his native Japan he is not always readily available. Yamato is a brilliant but unethical surgeon, capable of performing extensive body reconstruction and the intricate microsurgery necessary for face transplants.

Ray Haywood - A rookie on the force, Ray struggles to gain respect from his fellow officers and often worries that he stands in the shadow of his mother, Chief Olivia Haywood. Many of his colleagues question how such a young, unproven agent was selected to undergo amnion implantation. Ray is determined to prove himself, even at the risk of himself or the mission.

Officer Charles Olson - Colleagues who were around when Officer Olson first joined Witness Protection twenty years ago remember him as a squat balding man in his late 50s. He has since matured into a swarthy, statuesque 35-year-old stud, a transition that may have something to do with his close relationship with plastic surgeon Doctor Yamato and the unsolved disappearance of several items from the evidence locker relating to the investigation into Yamato's past misdeeds.
Beneath his handsome exterior, Olson remains a dirty old man rotten to the core, willing to sell out his fellow officers and top secret witness protection details for the right price. He is a slippery character, somehow dodging two investigations into police corruption, as well as retirement.
Has the hots for his partner, Miss Summers.

Officer Jennifer Summers - A well-meaning agent who cares deeply about her work. She has personally rehomed a number of witnesses in her own home, despite her allergies to cat and dog hair.

Professor Frank Heywood - Once a respected lecturer and husband of Olivia Heywood, Frank realised that his considerable genius would be better served in the career of mega-maniacal genius. Using his connections to his wife, he was able to get his hands on a large cache of illegal technology and use it carve out a nice section of the criminal underworld. He is now hunted by his wife and son.

Notable tech

Amnion - recently discovered in the Mariana Trench, the amnion are a rare species of jellyfish that displays remarkable properties. When implanted into a human (a process with only a 40% survival rate), the amnion spreads its many long tentacles through the entirety of the host body, integrating itself so fully that it cant be removed. Though retaining a normal outward appearance, the host's flesh is converted into a gelatinous substance identical to that of the amnion. This flesh can be molded into any shape, and can withstand extensive trauma, piercing, and cutting wounds, though the flexible form comes at the cost of a 20-30% reduction in muscle strength . The blood of the host becomes a clear fluid. Due to the risks of implantation, only special field agents are given the amnion.
The amnion is not without its weaknesses, and is particularly sensitive to even minor changes in its host's blood chemistry. Certain drugs or a high blood alcohol content can temporarily disable the parasite and its shape-shifting abilities.

Synth Skin - Synthetic spray-on flesh, usually used by officers as a field-dressing to patch up wounds. Has a plastic-sheen to it. Veteran officers often show off how much synth skin they have as a badge of honour.

ICE - stands for Interactive Computer Environment. If a criminal is regarded as too dangerous for regular imprisonment, they are submerged in liquid-filled pods and their minds downloaded into a virtual prison, where they can be rehabilitated. ICE is the name of the operating system that runs the virtual environment.

Divisions

Vice Squad - deals with gambling, narcotics and prostitution. An undesirable department due to the seedy and unpleasant nature of the work, most officers are transferred here as punishment for some misdemeanor.

Witness Protection - responsible for taking care of witnesses thought to be in danger of retribution, usually from organized crime gangs. Here witnesses are given fresh identities and safe accommodation until their time to testify. In cases where their safety is still in question, witnesses may be arranged permanent, new lives even after trials have concluded.

Undercover Operations - has undercover agents placed deep within many criminal organizations. Their work is deeply secretive, their agents highly trained and expertly disguised.

Criminal Investigations -

Animal Control - As well as handling mundane cases of wild, dangerous, and mistreated animal, Animal Control also deals with a significant number of things that can only be termed "monsters", be they ultra-rare species that have fallen into myth, mutant humans, or the creations of mentally unstable scientists. Animal Control Officers are a gung-ho lot, prone to shooting first, decapitating second, burning and salting the corpse third and asking questions fourth.
